reviews.title: Great Quality Pure Maple Syrup at Great Value
reviews.review_text: I usually don't buy this item in generic or store brands because of ill perceived notions the quality is not as good. Thanks to budget restraints, I am happy to report that my default bias against store brands being lesser quality has been disproven. The Great Value Pure Maple Syrup exceeded my expectations by far as I found the syrup to be of full flavored and rich tasting. I will definitely be placing this item among my list of regular items that I buy monthly, and best part, is I'm enjoying the luxurious taste of Pure Maple syrup, at a ‘ Great Value'. Thanks-You, Walmart! - Bobby B. Walmart Member since 2025 Eugene, Oregon

reviews.title: Good upgrade for pancakes
reviews.review_text: I like maple syrup. Easier on the glucose readings; light texture; and natural product. Must be refrigerated after opening, so I usually buy the small container since I only use it occasionally.

reviews.title: YUMMMM
reviews.review_text: We live in the Northwoods of Wisconsin where we can get pure maple syrup easily. This was fantastic! It's not syrup season here, so I had to pinch hit, and this did not disappoint.

reviews.title: Great taste at a good price
reviews.review_text: Love this affordable maple syrup, especially for baking. We use a lot of maple syrup for breakfast and when making granola. This product consistently takes great!
this is our favorite maple syrup. It taste so good and it's 100% affordable. I don't think my toddler has ever had fake maple syrup. We make sure to always have this in the house.

reviews.title: Didn't care for this one
reviews.review_text: It was watered down if you asked me. Maple Syrup is usually thicker. There just wasn't any "taste" to this particular batch. Overall, watery and thin and bland

I liked what I was buying before because I liked what it tasted like. I'm changing what I'm buying now because I need to go on a diet so it won't be the same thing. I hope I'm finding things that I can enjoy eating.

reviews.title: Watery but better than imitation.
reviews.review_text: For a "discount" item, it was good. It's a little watery for my taste which to me suggests it's very thinned out. Careful of the pour or your waffles will swim. I would love to see a little stronger consistency, but with two girls who make waffles and pancakes about every other day, I'll take watery at a discount. Decent flavor. I encourage my girls to experiment with spices to make it as flavorful as the higher more "designer" maples. A mason jar, cheese cloth wrapped spices like cinnamon and vanilla sticks, and the maple over a couple days-yummy.

reviews.title: Just ok
reviews.review_text: I got this because I only needed a small amount. I am used to locally made syrup. This was thin and tasted like flavoring was added. Could just be my old tongue lol

reviews.title: Nice packing, not nice syrup
reviews.review_text: Really didn't like this syrup. I've been buying the cheap stuff all my life and I'll just keep going with that, this fancy stuff had little flavor and left an aftertaste that I can't even describe. The bottle is nice tho, I can appreciate the nice packaging! And it smells good too. I just didn't like how it tasted.

reviews.title: Definitely not vermont maples

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These chocolates are the highlight of my valentines, they always taste great and are usually gone the second I bring them into the house, I recommend them for anyone who has a sweet tooth around valentines or wants to brighten up someone's day!

There aren't any flavors that really stand out, but it's decent quality, and it's chocolate.

reviews.title: A Valentines Day stable since I was little
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] At this point, I don't know who hasn't tried these. I picked these up every single Valentine's Day and received them ever since I was just a little girl. There's really nothing bad I can say besides a lot of sugar, but if you're eating chocolate, shouldn't be a problem for you. I will continue buying these forever. If you haven't bought it yet, I don't know what you're waiting for. Highly recommend! My fav is nut caramel.

reviews.title: Delicious!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Russel Stover has done it yet again this year with their assorted chocolate red foil heart. The variety of chocolate is delish, and there was something for everyone in my family, even my children who like standard chocolates, and me who prefers the dark chocolate. The strawberry one was delicious as well. The packing is lovely and would make for a great gift. The chocolates stay nice and safe in their little cutouts, and the box keeps them from getting hard or discoloring. Overall, a delicious treat.

reviews.title: Nice smaller size assortment
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These are delicious! This is an awesome smaller size foil heart that offers a variety of different flavor chocolates that are packaged nicely in a heart shaped box making it perfect to give as a gift!

reviews.title: Love the Classic Red Box
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been a fan of Russell Stovers for years. This box is perfect for any valentine, family, friend, or an employee. A box from Russell Stovers means great chocolates and candies. It also can mean more to a person than you know-candy reaches the soul. As soon as I see this classic heart shaped box I know who it is and get excited when I get these boxes.The assorted chocolates are my favorite with that rich milk chocolate, creamy centers, and some with nuts and chews. It does not matter if it is dark chocolate or milk chocolate. I love them both.With assorted I get both which makes me smile. I like this box because you always have a different piece of candy and the variety is fun. This classic red box is beautiful and simple. I would love for all of my family and friends to just give me this box and nothing else. This is a gift that will make anyone smile.

reviews.title: A Delicious Mystery?
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I liked that this box had an assortment of flavors, though I was curious as to why they included two strawberry flavored ones in the box instead of finding one other chocolate flavor to include, even if it was milk chocolate — I liked the variety for such a small box. My main concern was that the list of chocolates was only printed on a sticker attached to the wrapper and not anywhere on the box, I had to keep the wrapper with the box until I finished it. I don't mind the flavor being a surprise at first, but I do like knowing what flavor it is after biting into it — I shouldn't have to keep the wrapper just for that.

reviews.title: Chocolate Dream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This small assorted chocolate heart box from Russell Stover is delicious. Each piece was so fresh and mouth watering tasty. Perfect size for one or a small gift for another. The outer foil covering adds to the beauty of this box. When unwrapped there is an image of a rose on the top, which is lovely. Would recommend for someone you love or for a thank you gift.

reviews.title: Great assortment

My favorite of the new assortment is the caramel and nut caramel.this assortment does not have one in the assortment that I do not like which for me there is usually at least one chocolate I don't like, not this assortment though I love them all . Of course they still have the freshness and quality you expect with Russel Stover,Thanks

reviews.title: Beautiful, nice table
reviews.review_text: I was genuinely surprised by the overall quality of this table for how inexpensive it was! Assembly was very easy, the instruction manual is well written and contains QR codes for steps you may need help with understanding. I've assembled so much furniture it's insane, but this table has both quality materials and quality screws, etc (I was surprised their dowels are wood for this, as the cube systems Walmart sells usually have plastic) the table isn't real wood, but the finish has a nice grain texture to it. The table is very sturdy, and I really love it!!! I would absolutely recommend this, you can't beat the quality, the price, or Walmarts incredibly fast shipping!

reviews.title: Really nice coffee table for the price
reviews.review_text: I love the style of this coffee table and I would say you get what you're paying for quality wise. It is not the nicest material, but it is still sturdy and holds up well structurally. I really love this table.

reviews.title: Great shampoo, wish the scent lasted longer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo scent is vanilla cream and pumpkin, and I think it smells pretty true to that. It smells like fresh pumpkin with undertones of vanilla. The only real downfall is that it is not an overly strong scent. It is not one of those scents that fill the shower when you use it or lingers around afterwards. There are pros and cons to that, especially if you are someone or are around someone who has allergies to scents a lot. I personally wish it was stronger, but it is still a good scent. As a shampoo it is great. Leaves my hair feeling clean and soft overall. It lathered well and rinsed out easily. I will say that the pump is not labeled to tell you which way to turn it to unlock it, not a major issue, but something to keep in mind. If you have used native hair products in the past this one is no different. So if the scent sounds good to you I would recommend trying it out, especially with the upcoming fall season.

reviews.title: Great product without the junk!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo was awesome! The smell was great without being too overwhelming and the fact that I could read all the ingredients in the label was very important to me. The bottle was huge so you definitely get an excellent value. I have coarse 4b hair that is chemically relaxed and this shampoo made it feel soft and smooth!

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Native Hair Care Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin shampoo is a great match to the conditioner, especially for those who enjoy seasonal scents. It lathers nicely without using harsh sulfates, so it cleans the hair effectively without leaving it dry or stripped. The fragrance is warm and comforting, adding a cozy touch to your shower routine. I appreciate that it's silicone-free, sulfate-free, and paraben-free, which makes it feel gentle and safe for everyday use. The pump bottle is sleek and easy to use, though like the conditioner, it might be tricky when it gets near empty. Overall, it's a refreshing shampoo that pairs perfectly with the conditioner to leave hair clean, soft, and smelling amazing.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The smell of this shampoo is unreal! The only thing is that I think my hair will need to be washed more frequently because it has been getting greasier sooner. However, for the clean ingredients, soft hair, and great smell, I would repurchase!

From the first wash, my hair felt soft, hydrated, and so easy to manage. The scent is warm and comforting—not overpowering, just cozy and sweet. reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I absolutely love the Native Vanilla Pumpkin Shampoo and Conditioner! The scent is incredible, like a warm, cozy pumpkin dessert with a touch of creamy vanilla. Every wash feels like a little seasonal treat. The conditioner leaves my hair soft, smooth, and manageable, and the fragrance lingers just enough to feel fresh all day. For the quality and the clean ingredients, the value is outstanding. I'll definitely be stocking up before the season ends!

The scent is delicious and not overpowering. It does not have the chemical-leaning aroma of the Dunkin products. I love the lather on this shampoo. It's creamy and coats the scalp nicely. My hair is curly and on the drier side and this shampoo is the perfect balance for its needs. I am sold on Native shampoo and will willingly try other scents in future!

reviews.title: Definitely worth it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The pumpkin and vanilla scent isn't quite what I expected—it's not bad, just a little different. However, this shampoo and conditioner really impressed me with how well they moisturize and lather. My hair feels soft, clean, and refreshed after each use. The bottles are big, making it a great value, and I appreciate the minimal ingredient list for a simpler formula. Overall, it may not be my favorite scent, but the quality and performance definitely make it worth it.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Not a fan of this scent at all and quite frankly, I feel very disappointed in this year's fall lineup. Not a hint of pumpkin, vanilla or maple like the notes are described to be. It's musky more than anything which just isn't my type of scent to use. My husband didn't even like the smell of the shampoo. To him, he said it smelled like spoiled yogurt. Usually we like Native products and while I love the idea of Vanilla Cream and Pumpkin, to me the execution wasn't there. I was really hoping for a pumpkin cupcake kind of scent given the description but nope. Better luck next time, Native...

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like this shampoo, it smells so good. Not sure if it smells like pumpkin, but it smells like fall. It didn't make my hair feel dry or oily. The price isn't bad for size and I like that it's a clean product.

reviews.title: Effective moisturizing shampoo with a lovely fall
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I recently received Native's Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin Moisturizing Shampoo for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review and I absolutely loved this product. This shampoo has a smooth texture that lathers over the hair effortlessly. One pump of this shampoo can lather over a large portion of your hair. This shampoo does a great job at removing the daily buildup of oils and dirt in your hair while also not striping it of all hydration completely. It actually is very effective at cleaning the hair without being striping and instead providing moisture. The scent is a major pro of this shampoo as it has a lovely fall scent of vanilla cream and pumpkin that is so beautiful. The packaging is also great as this shampoo container has a fair amount of shampoo and the pump dispenser releases the perfect amount with each pump. I definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a beautifully scented moisturizing shampoo that comes at an affordable price.

reviews.title: Nourishing shampoo with safe ingredients!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love Native brand products because they use completely risk-free ingredients. The Native Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin Moisturizing Shampoo is just as impressive. Every time I wash my hair it's like a cozy, spa-like experience, since this shampoo smells like fresh pumpkin pie. The pump on this shampoo is convenient for perfect distribution, and I think Native shampoo delivers excellent value for the cost, especially when compared to high-end brands. After using it, my hair feels thoroughly cleaned, soft, and well-moisturized every time!

reviews.title: Effective
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Native Shampoo in the Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin scent is a delightful seasonal treat for your hair. The fragrance is warm, cozy, and comforting—like a blend of sweet vanilla and spiced pumpkin pie. Beyond the amazing scent, this shampoo does a great job of gently cleansing without stripping moisture. It's made with clean, simple ingredients and is free from sulfates, parabens, and silicones, which helps maintain your hair's natural balance and shine. The formula lathers well and leaves your hair feeling soft, light, and refreshed. It pairs beautifully with the matching conditioner for an even smoother finish. Perfect for fall or anytime you want a touch of indulgence, Native's Vanilla Cream & Pumpkin Shampoo turns your everyday routine into a luxurious, aromatic experience.

reviews.title: Very good product!
reviews.review_text: I was very skeptical about this shampoo. I honestly didn't think it would tone my hair at all. I was pleasantly surprised. This toned my hair from a brassy/yellow fresh bleached look…yuck..to a nice silver platinum. I would recommend using an actual toner to tone hair, but in a pinch and for maintaining color in between colorings, this is perfect. It has violet..which is purple/blue and it cancels the yellows and the oranges in bleached hair. I would recommend this for sure. Side note: this product smells SOOOOO good.

reviews.title: Terrible!
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I had just gotten my hair done and there was a little brassiness near my roots, where my hair is the darkest. Long story short… it did absolutely nothing at all for the brassiness but instead turned the whole rest of my head an ugly drab grayish white! Before using my hair was a blond pretty color. I will definitely not use it again, I'm just hoping it will wash out when I wash my hair next time. I've never had this happen with any other brand of purple shampoo. I definitely do not recommend this product. Mine is going in the garage, what a waste of money.

reviews.title: The best!

Even with wet hair in the shower, as soon as I rinsed, I was audibly shocked. It's easily the best purple shampoo I've used. Its a bit drying on hair but not much and some conditoner to follow solves this. I have literally nothing negative to say. I love my hair color since I've started using this.

reviews.title: Maui Moisture Clarifying Shampoo Review
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Maui Moisture Clarifying Shampoo is a refreshing and effective option for those looking to deep clean their hair and scalp, especially after build-up from styling products, hard water, or excess oil. Formulated with hibiscus water and passionfruit extract, this shampoo is designed to cleanse without stripping away the hair's natural moisture. Packaging and Texture: The shampoo comes in a brightly colored, sturdy plastic bottle with a flip-top cap for easy dispensing. The consistency is a bit on the thicker side, but it lathers up nicely and spreads easily through the hair, requiring only a small amount for a full cleanse. Performance: This clarifying shampoo does an excellent job of removing product buildup, residue, and impurities from the scalp and hair. Despite its clarifying abilities, it doesn’t leave hair feeling dry or overly stripped, which can sometimes be a concern with other deep-cleansing shampoos. The formula gently cleanses while maintaining the hair’s moisture balance, leaving it feeling refreshed and light. Scent: The fragrance is a tropical, fruity blend that’s refreshing without being overwhelming. It lingers subtly on the hair, leaving it smelling clean and fresh. Results: After using the Clarifying Shampoo, hair feels thoroughly cleansed but not stripped or brittle. It’s a great choice for those who regularly use styling products, oils, or dry shampoos, as it clears away residue without compromising the health of your hair. While it’s effective in clearing build-up, it also helps to maintain the softness and manageability of the hair, which makes it a great option for regular use—though, depending on your hair type, you may want to alternate with a gentler shampoo to prevent over-drying. Final Thoughts: The Maui Moisture Clarifying Shampoo is a solid choice for anyone looking for a gentle yet effective way to cleanse their hair. It provides a deep clean without the harshness typical of some clarifying shampoos, and its nourishing ingredients ensure your hair stays hydrated and smooth. Perfect for occasional use to remove buildup and refresh your hair, this shampoo delivers great results without sacrificing moisture or softness.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Packaging is visually appealing and easy to use. The product smells pretty good considering it has apple cider vinegar as an ingredient. Overall hair feels clean after use.

reviews.title: Nice shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo leaves my hair feeling clean. The scent is nice kinda of a menthol but very faint. The packaging is really cute. Pricing is on point with other products like this.

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like this shampoo! It smells nice and makes my hair feel clean. The only downside to this is the bottle shape and the type of plastic- it is very difficult to squeeze.

reviews.title: Love
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Nice and light clarifying shampoo. Usually they make my hair feel stripped, but my hair feels clean as well as hydrated after using this shampoo!

reviews.title: Clean and clarifying shampoo.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is my first time trying out this brand. I have to say this clarifying shampoo left my hair feeling clean and shiny. The scent is not overwhelming.

reviews.title: Good not great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like that this cleans without stripping my hair and my curls do look nice with it. There is just nothing amazing about it to write home with it works and does its job but not much more.

reviews.title: Shampoo cleans scalp
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo does help to clean my scalp. It does have a minty/vinegar scent and tingles slightly, but it feels nice.. I received this product free for my honest review.

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Extremely minty. If you love that feeling through your hair then go for it! I find it refreshing but I’m not in love with the shampoo. My hair doesn’t feel super clear for some reason

reviews.title: Smells great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This scalp care shampoo smelled so good. It left my hair shinning, soft and without tangles. It comes in a cute fancy looking bottle. I definitely will be purchasing this product in the future

reviews.title: Good but not great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like this, but didn’t love it. The scent is very strong so take that for what you will. Did a decent job and will continue to use to see if I like it over time

reviews.title: Nice product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product Works well to clarify scalp and hair buildup. Feels nice and smooth. Has a nice clean scent and is a good price. Would purchase again.

This is a steal of a deal. It got to me 11 days sooner than was expected via shipping expected date. It runs about a full size small and it's not a heavy weight hoodie, but it does keep you warmer. Over all I would recommend this especially at the price point. Under $11 US is not going to be beat in my opinion. I would definitely buy this again.

reviews.title: Undersized
reviews.review_text: I normally buy a 1x in jackets. Because I wanted to wear this as a cold morning, coffee warmer, I ordered a 3x so I could wrap myself in it. I can barely zip it up! It runs a full 2 sizes too small IF it was a WOMANS jacket- this is suppose to be a MANS jacket! Really disappointed since it appears to be a well made jacket, and the fuzzy lining is exactly what I wanted. I'll keep it, but unfortunately it's not what I was looking for.

reviews.title: Made for little people
reviews.review_text: Sizes run very small. I ordered an XL and it was too small. I then ordered a 2 XL and it still fit very tight. I'm going to keep them and give them as presents. I won't order a 3rd coat. It takes about a month to get shipped. It's a very good product if you can find your size and wait for it to arrive.

reviews.title: Geo
reviews.review_text: I EMAILED THEM FOUR OR FIVE TIMES. TO DISCUSS A VERY HIGH SHIPPING CHARGE. I PURCHASED 45 OF THEM AND I RECEIVED ZERO RESPONSE SO ZERO STARS ON CUSTOMER SERVICE. OVERALL VALUE WAS GOOD FOR THE PRICE OTHERWISE. GEO

reviews.title: $10 Purchase
reviews.review_text: The zipper was on the wrong side and it was already frayed when it arrived. Size was too small even though I ordered a larger size. It's great for wearing around the house but not something I would wear elsewhere. It was less than $10 so an okay value

reviews.title: I plan to stop ordering online from Walmart.
reviews.review_text: Just inferior. I don't know what I was expecting for the price, which doubles as you add shipping and tax. I ordered a size 2x but it was way too small for me. When I tried to return it to my local Walmart store they would not accept the return or refund my money saying "this is not a walmart item" even though I ordered it from the Walmart web site. This was deceptive, the old bait and switch. I hope to never order online from Walmart again, and plan to urge others not to.

reviews.title: Beware When Shopping On-Line at WalMart
reviews.review_text: Jacket was sold as a men's size 3X but was more a size men's Med. I did not return it because it would have cost more to return it. I gave it to someone who could wear it. This is the 3rd time I have ordered on-line from WalMart and gotten wrong sizes and/or defective clothes.

reviews.title: Unhappy Grand mother who lives 16 hrs. away
reviews.review_text: I sent this to my grandson who wears men's small but this didn't fit at all the arm length was way to short and didn't fit anykind of way. My daughter tried to return it for larger store to walmart where they live and they would not allow her to reorder a new one . And the jeans I sent was the same with the opposite problem, they were too big and did not have them in store .So my gradso has no jacket and only one pair of jeans because your sale price wouldn't cover cost of any jeans in your store. Info is needed to be printed on your web page so the public is aware of incorrect sizing.

reviews.title: Never Buy Clothes Online
reviews.review_text: imcorrect size, the size listed on the tag isnt the size you get. they run netween one amd teo sozes too small. again the jassle of waitong a month to possibly get a return after spendi6jouts between walmart com support and the local stores make it a waste of time. stick to dold and shipped by walmart.com or go-to your local store

reviews.title: Nice, fleece-lined Jacket
reviews.review_text: The jackets run VERY SMALL! That being said, Unfortunately, they are not as comfortable as I had hoped! Plus, in FL, You need to be able to wear layers, and since they run small, if you wear layers underneath, it is VERY UNCOMFORTABLE! Otherwise it is a GREAT Buy!!

reviews.title: Be cautious when using Walmart's Market Place
reviews.review_text: This was the worst experience I've had. I ordered two different coats, waited over 2 months, I had to call Walmart and have then reach out to the vendor. We got this coat but we did not receive the second one. Their response was just to refund it. I needed the coat, waited 2 months and the answer was refund, no sorry for the inconvenience, nothing, refund it!! While I realize it was not Walmart's fault, it's their Market Place... Their lack of care or concern has led me to believe, I should not to order again from Walmart's market place!

reviews.title: Pantene Moisture Shampoo review
reviews.review_text: Everyone tells you that Pantene is a brand known for its affordable but substandard products but is that true? People look at Pantene and ask “why are there so many ingredients just to do one simple thing?” The question I want to answer is: “are all the ingredients in Pantene's products needed?” My goal here today is to explain what each ingredient is and for you to decide if there are still too many ingredients. The first hair product I researched is the Pantene Moisture Shampoo. There are 16 ingredients (not including water and fragrance) all doing something important. To make this simple, I will be grouping products depending on what they do. The first group is preservatives. They make sure that the hair product doesn't grow mold and bacteria.There are 5 different preservatives: Trisodium citrate Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Tetrasodium EDTA Sodium benzoate Methylisothiazolinone. These 5 ingredients work together to help preserve your shampoo so it is safe to use. If there weren't any preservatives, you could get bacterial breakouts on your scalp and could develop fungal diseases. The second group is different types of conditioners. These are products that help heal and condition hair. There aren't as many conditioning agents in shampoo as there are in conditioner but having them can still drastically impact your hair's health. In this category there are 7 different ingredients: Panthenol Citricum Salicylate Cocamidopropyl Betaine Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride Histidine, Cocamide MEA. These ingredients help counteract the damaging effects of striping your hair of all its oils. Sulfates are amazing cleaning agents because they get rid of everything, putting back moisture and oil will leave your hair not only feeling clean, but also healthy. The last category is cleaning agents. These products are there to help remove dirt and oil. Your scalp constantly creates sebum or oil and if you don't remove it, it will start clogging your hair follicles. This can lead your hair to stop growing . It can also affect how healthy the ends of your hair are because new hair isn't growing. There are 4 ingredients in this group, but 2 of them are there to improve the texture of your hair. These ingredients are Sodium chloride Sodium laureth sulfate Glycol distearate Lauramidopropyl betaine. It is a common misconception that sulfates are bad but if you have ever used shampoo with sulfates you have probably noticed that your hair feels a lot cleaner. You might have even noticed that it looks and feels more healthy. This is because your hair is getting cleaned better. The oil your hair produces is important, but an excess of oils will damage your hair. If you have had better results by using a product that doesn't have any sulfates, then by all means keep on using it. Not all products work the same on everyone, but, if you don't feel like you have been getting a good wash or your hair gets oily really quick, you might think about switching to a shampoo with sulfates. Overall, knowing what is in your hair products and what each ingredient does is super important. I hope you came away from this review knowing that there is a reason for each ingredient that goes into a hair product and not to judge something before you buy it. Resources: https://incidecoder.com/products/pantene-daily-moisture-renewal-shampoo https://www.cosmeticsinfo.org/ingredient/lauramidopropyl-betaine/ https://atamankimya.com/sayfalar.asp?LanguageID=2&cid=3&id=3322&id2=11199#:~:text=Ethylene%20glycol%20distearate%20is%20used%20in%20creams%2C%20lotions%2C%20and%20moisturizers,and%20provides%20a%20pearlescent%20appearance.

reviews.review_text: I bought this in a travel size and was amazed at how clean and soft my hair is! reviews.title: Why did you change the formula
reviews.review_text: Pantene changed the “ look” but also changed the formula. I got the new 72 hour lush shampoo moisture renewal, and it dried my hair out and also burned my scalp and it itches so bad. The old formula didn't do that and had been using it for years. I just ran out of the old formula that says 24 hour moisture. I got the new formula today and experienced this. I don't know what to do now. Why fix something that doesn't need fixed. Bring back the old formula.

I buy the Shampoo and conditioner both. I love how Pantene cleans my hair. I mean really cleans it!!! I don't use the conditioner immediately after washing my hair. I wait until I am done with everything else in my Shower. And i have a hard bristle brush and My conditioner. After i work the conditioner into my hair really, really well. I get my brush while conditioner is still in my hair. And I brush through it just like i would if it was dry. I part it like i wear it and brush it back and down . And when I go to rinse it? I use the brush under the water and brush it out as I rinse it. It comes out smooth and silky. And if you think you might still have a bit of conditioner left in it. stand under shower and get your hair like your going to put it up in a ponytail and pull it down to tips of hair. Do several times until feels clear.

I am very sensitive when it comes to makeup removing wipes. I used another brand for a long time but they changed something in the formula that made my eyes burn every time I used them. I love these CeraVe wipes! They help clean the makeup off but also leave my face feeling hydrated and refreshed. I would definitely recommend for anyone with sensitive skin or eyes.

I liked this product. In that it is a Cera ve product I thought it would be good. I personally like a nice soft scent to products which this one doesn't have hence the 4 stars. I do get why companies don't scent products as some people can be sensitive to scents. I liked the product %26 would recommend it.

reviews.title: Game-Changer for My Skincare Routine
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleansing Makeup Remover Wipes! These plant-based face wash wipes have become an essential part of my skincare routine. They effortlessly remove makeup, dirt, and impurities, leaving my skin feeling clean and refreshed. The fact that they're plant-based is a huge bonus, as I appreciate products that are gentle on both my skin and the environment. These wipes are super hydrating, which is fantastic for my dry skin. I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's texture and hydration since I started using them. They're also incredibly convenient for on-the-go use or late nights when I'm too tired for a full skincare routine. Overall, I give these wipes a solid 5 stars for their effectiveness, eco-friendliness, and skin-friendly ingredients. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Light soft powder.
reviews.review_text: For those asking about the difference between this and the HD powder, there is a huge difference. Being very pale myself, I prefer the HD powder because instead of turning me Gray, it dulls the Orange hues in any face makeup I use. This powder is a softer less silky textured powder. It is much more natural looking. I have extremely oily skin and this hasn't helped Mattify anymore than any other powder but is definitely less candy and feels nice on your skin. Good setting powder although I would be cautious of putting it on dry areas. This powder seems less finely milled or maybe contains less or no silicone than the HD powder. I think it would look chalky on dry skin.

reviews.title: I didn't know what to expect
reviews.review_text: I didn't know what to expect with this or how it would differ from the HD Powder but I am a sucker for anything new. I am very glad I tried it. It is different from the HD Powder and I like it better. I feel like the HD sits on top of my skin whereas this powder isn't visible at all. I have HD in both the white and yellow but I feel like I look like I have rice powder on. I am very fair, mid 40's with average wrinkles and aging. I have used this with and without foundation. I would prefer to not wear foundation but ELF discontinued the mineral line much to my dismay. I am preferring the more natural look of using concealer and this powder and I think I look younger without the heavy makeup. This has no coverage and no color, it just disappears on my face but it gives a more matte finish and makes my face appear smoother. I love being able to put it on throughout the day without ever having to worry about looking chalky or having makeup in my lines. This powder is very soft so beware of dropping it, mine arrived broken but I use it anyway. I apply it with the Ultimate Blending Brush (LOVE!) and it works great. Am buying a few extra to have before they sell out! This works great with foundation and doesn't add any additional color, it also works great without foundation, letting you keep a more natural look without the shine.

reviews.title: Beautiful coverage
reviews.review_text: I love my elf brand cosmetics. My favorite thing about elf, is the price. You get very nice quality makeup for a bargain. I put this on after my foundation, and it looks very pretty and natural. I always apply this with a brush, and the nice thing is, is that you don't need to put on a ton to get good coverage. This is a great match for my light to medium skin tone. I would recommend this product.

Ive been running this fan non stop for 4 months now with no problems. We live in an old apartment with no central air and no vent in the bathroom- put this fan in the bathroom and no more poo smells! Loved it so much we bought two more to circulate cold air from outside into our way too well heated appartment. The furnace runs all winter and we are on the bottom floor- these fans helped us cool off our space.

reviews.title: Great Price With Awesome Features!
reviews.review_text: This window fan works well, especially for the price, airflow is pretty good and it has a super low setting where you almost can't hear it running. It includes a detachable screen incase you're installing it in a window with no screen. The side covers completely close the window opening and they can stretch out quite far. Well worth the money if you want a good window fan!

reviews.title: Actually a pretty good fan....
reviews.review_text: This fits my 22 inch bathroom window sill perfectly. It fits into my window height also. The item comes with a description of its noise level indicating 53db. Using a decimeter I found that in fact, at the lowest speed it was as they said. I also measured the noise levels for second and third speeds at approximately 59-60 and 69-70 respectively. The material is plastic and malleable...not the kind of cheap plastic that breaks or cracks with little effort. The power is adequate for a small bathroom and aided by its moveable fans in different directions. This fan is very convenient and I would recommend it to others.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: I'm disappointed with these window fans. They have gone downhill. These fans used to be a lot more powerful, now you can barely feel a breeze even when they are on high. There also used to be a switch on the front that allowed you to turn it to blow air in or pull air out without having to physically take the fan out of the window

reviews.title: Great light weight window fan
reviews.review_text: We don't have AC so it's nice having a fan to bring in cooler air. Very useful unit to place in my office window. I like the fact that it can be easily place in the window for cooling. It can also be reversed to draw out air if the room is too hot.

reviews.title: Be Careful Installing This Fan!
reviews.review_text: Why would they make a window fan without anything on it to keep from falling out of the window?? I ALMOST had it falling all the way down (thank God for my quick reflex and the cord to grab!). That is my only complaint... Otherwise it's good for the value. I must say, though, it is very interesting to watch me put it in the window without any tragedies happening.

reviews.title: The Best Fan if it had an intake/exhaust switch.
reviews.review_text: I love it, especially the quiet speed it is truly quiet, reasonable price, fits my window perfectly with the auto-locking expanders. I can use the removable feet to set in on a table. I wanted to rate it Five but the only thing it's that it doesn't have intake/exhaust function only reversible, so I can only manually turn it around for intake/exhaust. I wish they could add a switch to it for intake and exhaust function, then it will be a perfect fan The Best of all!!

reviews.title: Nice fan for the money
reviews.review_text: I have tall and fairly narrow, 24" windows, so it limits the selection of fans that fit. I crossed my fingers and picked this one. It's not bad overall. It does fit my window, just barely, and I do not extend the sides at all. It's pretty much impossible to make a bladed fan totally silent, but this is quiet enough, and it moves a decent amount of air. The only reason for the 4-star rating is what they called the "manual" reversible feature. What that really means is you take the fan out of the window, turn it around, and put it back in the window. In fairness, it is made to do that. The control is accessible from both sides, and the cord also works both ways. But you would not call it convenient. At this price point I guess you can't expect much more. Otherwise I am satisfied with this fan.

reviews.title: Good value
reviews.review_text: Fits great in my slide up window, small enough I can put a window lock above it for safety. In the sideways sliding window, not so much. I had to put it lengthwise, which left the whole width of the windows open. No safety there. With that said, it works great, I just wish it had a little more power.. I would recommend this fan. As to durability I can't really comment, I've had it for two days but it seems sturdy. Hey, If it gets us thru this summer, I'll be very happy with it (and it appears that it will). I just use them in the early morning and late afternoon to pull in the cooler air.

reviews.title: This is what I've been needing!!!
reviews.review_text: My apartment is inexplicably stuffy; it'll be 60° outside and 80° inside. This little fan has already exceeded my expectations on night one. It doesn't actively cool like an air conditioner, but it exchanges stale inside air with fresh outside air. I think it's going to help quite a bit with my energy bill this summer! It's not very loud either, in my opinion.

reviews.title: "Manual" labor involved...
reviews.review_text: Well... I'm pleased overall. Lots of power! The little screen thingy is a pain to get on with long nails, but that's my problem... The screen is tight, as it should be. My only issue is the "manual" reverse exhaust option... I guess I didn't read enough reviews, or no one mentioned it... "manual" means you literally/physically have to turn the fan around. You can do that with any fan :-/ But in the end, it stays where I want it to be, in front of a window on a shelf, so that if I do need to change the direction of the air flow, I can do so easily. If I set it into the window... Not so much.

How can I tell you about a product that you promised would already be here but now it will take over a week! This is a stupid survey because your company cannot keep it word on a delivery date, which is the only reason I purchased from WALMART. I could have gone cheaper for the same product if I was willing to wait 5 days instead of 2. NOW I HAVE TO WAIT OVER A WEEK AND I PAID A HIGHER PRICE!

reviews.title: Great Everyday Face Wash
reviews.review_text: I've been using this face wash for about a month now and am loving it. I have acne prone skin but my previous cleanser from a different brand was starting to dry out my skin. So I decided to try this one out. I have to say, my acne has cleared up a lot since starting to use it! Even though this isn't an acne based face wash I highly recommend

reviews.title: Amazing cleanser
reviews.review_text: I have very dry and sensitive skin so I wanted a cleanser that would work really well on me. I have been using this product for a week in the morning and in the evening before going to bed and it's perfect for my skin. I would recommend this to everyone.

reviews.title: Favorite!
reviews.review_text: I have used this cleanser for a good amount of time now and i can positively say that it is my absolute favorite cleanser ever. its so gentle on the skin, actually cleans your face. Perfect for double cleansing for a gentle cleanser afterwards. Leaves the skin really soft and smooth and hydrated, i was shocked at how good it is. Definitely repurchasing forever!

reviews.title: Fresh feeling
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a cruelty-free cleanser and came across this. I didn't think I would like this cleanser at first because I wasn't getting a good lather, but just rub your hands together for a few seconds vigorously and it lathers nicely. I feel that it gives me a clean and fresh feeling when done, and you can't beat the price.

reviews.title: Decent basic cleanser
reviews.review_text: Your run-of-the-mill plain foaming cleanser. Leaves your skin feeling clean but not completely stripped, although my skin did feel just a bit tight afterward. I notice a very light fragrance; I prefer my skincare to be fragrance-free. Great price, especially for the amount you get...you don't need much to get a little foaming action. Gave it four stars instead of five because I've used quite a few cleansers that are better than this one for the same price or less/same amount or more (mostly J- and K-beauty cleansers). If you want a basic cleanser at a nice price and you don't mind skincare with a light fragrance, this'll get the job done.

reviews.title: Love
reviews.review_text: There isn't many elf products I don't like, this stuff is good but it could be better. It doesn't really make my skin feel better after awhile when I apply and wash out you can't really tell I used anything my face just soaks it up an then it's dry again

reviews.title: Great simple cleanser!
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for about 6 months now, originally a gift from a friend. It cleans my face so well. It does dry out certain parts of my face (I have combination/sensitive skin), but nothing the rest of the hydration line doesn't help tame!

reviews.title: Swollen eyes / reaction
reviews.review_text: I have been using a mini version of this the past few days as I ran out of my YTTP cleanser. My eyes are extremely swollen and hurt, although I avoid my eyes when I cleanse. Possibly it's this cleanser paired with the ELF makeup remover liquid? I do use that liquid on my eyes, but I can't recall it making my eyes swell prior to using this cleanser… I do not typically have reactions to any products, so this is very unusual for me!

reviews.title: Cleans so well without stripping skin!
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I use it AM and PM, and a little bit goes a long way. I put 3-4 drops on wet fingers, rub my hands together, and apply in gentle circles on my wet face. Lathers nicely and has a gentle scent, and washes off easily too. I have combination skin - normal to dry cheeks and an oily T-zone. This cleanser leaves my skin nice and soft and not stripped dry or tight, unlike Cetaphil cleansers.

reviews.title: Good Stuff!
reviews.review_text: I have "mature" skin and thought maybe it wouldn't dry me out and gave it a try. I'm on my 2nd bottle. It lathers nice and rinses clean. When I say it rinses clean I mean as soon as I rinse my hands - as soon as the water hits them it is gone - completely washed away. I use a wash cloth to wash it away with and it comes off my face is easily as it does my hands. No residue whatsoever. My skin is sensitive as well as "mature" and this leaves my skin feeling really nice - not right at all and doesn't stir up any irritation. I really like it. I like the rest of the e.l.f. Holy Hydration products that I've tried too. The moisturizers are really good (the SPF 30 and the gel one in the pump). They're not at all greasy but they moisturize well. No thightness or irritation and my makeup doesn't slide off. The makeup remover is probably the most awesome thing I've used ever. The Holy Hydration line is great. I'll be buying a 3rd bottle of cleanser soon!

reviews.title: Great cleanser!
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product and loved the results. It does the job very well.

reviews.title: Feels nice and clean!
reviews.review_text: I got this about a week ago and I love it so much! It has a light scent which is pleasant. I love how I feel hydrated without feeling oily or shiny.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: This is gentle and refreshing. Usually the cleansers I get that are gentle leave my skin feeling unwashed but this one leaves me skin feeling amazing. I absolutely love this one. I got a sample if it a while ago and bought it three times since.

reviews.title: Really wanted to love it!
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to love it but my skin just didn't agree with it, after 2 months of using (the only thing that really has changed in my regimen), this really really broke me out. At first I thought I wasn't washing it off properly, but even then, it really just didn't agree with my skin. Still looking!

reviews.title: Great cleaner
reviews.review_text: Really good great for sensitive skin as well, super affordable too

reviews.title: four stars bc of the scent
reviews.review_text: I really love this cleanser! It foams and leaves my skin feeling nice. As the title says, I only give it four stars bc of its scent.

reviews.title: Absolute best cleanser for the money
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this several times and I am quite pleased with the result. I am able to wash my face and it is prepped for my serums. Takes all make off as well.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of cleansers, and I like this one. It doesn't give a stripped down squeaky clean, but that's the idea. My face still has some moisture.

reviews.title: Great Daily Cleanser
reviews.review_text: I use this as my daily cleanser and it works well on my normal to dry skin. I see no reason to spend more on other cleansers when this works so well. I will continue to use it regularly.

reviews.title: Best Gentle Cleanser
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this from a previous purchase and loved it so much that I had to order the larger size. It does an amazing job of removing my (even waterproof) makeup without making my face dry. A little can go a long way!!

reviews.title: Satisfied customer
reviews.review_text: I love how this facial cleaner makes my skin feel clean and refreshed. You only need a small amount since it lathers up well. I have learned that I get better results from gently applying the cleanser in a circular motion on my face and neck.

reviews.title: Wow! Just wow!
reviews.review_text: When I say this cleanser made me feel super clean, smooth and refreshed after its use.. it doesn't even justify. Had my skin feeling amazing and replenished after. Will definitely be using again.

reviews.title: Soft skin
reviews.review_text: Removes make up and keeps my skin feeling soft. Could do with a bigger bottle and like a thicker consistency as a general rule but great for the price

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! The smell is wonderful, you just need a very little bit to a get a nice lather, and it cleaned and hydrated my face sooo nice. Will definitely be buying again

reviews.title: This is a lovely gel to foam cleanser.
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for a couple of weeks everyday and I love it!!! You only need a small amount and it foams up really nice. My skin feels so soft and hydrated, I really don't want to use anything else.

reviews.title: amazing cleanser
reviews.review_text: i've bought the cleanser about a month ago and it's helped my skin, it's hydrating and helped make my skin feel smooth, it also has an amazing scent to it. it's amazing and cheap

reviews.title: My new staple cleanser
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing. My skin feels so smooth after use. I immediately follow up with my hydrating serums/moisturizer %26 have had great success. you can't beat the price. It doesn't take much at all to lather up %26 removes makeup like a pro.

reviews.title: Does exactly what it says
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is very hydrating. Most cleansers dry my face. This one actually does what it says. Absolutely would recommend for people with dry skin.

reviews.title: My favorite face wash
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for a few years now and it just does the job. I wash my face 2x per day an immediately use the moisturizer afterwards, my face always feel great.
i have dry skin and this is holy grail paired up with the holy hydration moisturizer. ive stopped breaking out and my skin has been looking so moisturized

reviews.title: Great hydrating mild facial cleanser
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! It leaves my skin clean and hydrated. It doesn't have much of a scent which I love and you don't have to use much…It lather's and rinses well. It's works great on my sensitive and combination skin.

reviews.title: Sorta Cleans
reviews.review_text: Its not the best cleanser. It doesn't lather much, it feels like it slides off. If I use a lot I can get it to clean well, but overall, not my favorite.

reviews.title: Refreshing
reviews.review_text: I use this Daily Cleanser face wash morning and night and love how refreshing it makes my skin feel, without feeling tight after use. I'm a mature woman with oily skin, large open pores and prone to frequent breakouts, I use this product along with the make up melting cleansing balm and my skin has never felt or looked better! All traces of make up are completely gone and my skin feels so refreshed and smooth - I wouldn't use anything else now x

reviews.title: Nice formula
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift and I love the thickness of it and I feel like it does cleanse my skin however I have dry skin and so it wasn't great for me because it took out most of my skins oils which is what it's supposed to do but It wasn't great for me but I would really to someone with oily skin

reviews.title: Favorite cleanser by elf
reviews.review_text: I needed a new daily cleanser after mine got discontinued. After trying sooo many different cleansers high and low budget, I found this one. It so light and gets the job done. Helps removing make up and feeling fresh. It does not dry my skin out or make it oily which was my problem with a lot of cleansers. I have fairly balanced skin and this works great at keeping it there. Been using for about 3 years now? And will continue. Price is friendly and product is worth it

reviews.title: Skin feels clean and hydrated
reviews.review_text: I love this. My skin loved the product, a little goes a long way so I appreciate that. It feels really clean overall.

reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is wonderful!!! I use it as my body wash too. My skin doesn't feel dry and itchy after my shower. Needles to say...I go thru alot of this stuff. I never want to be without it.

reviews.title: Amazing! must buy!
reviews.review_text: This product did wonders for my skin and I am so obsessed with it! If you have tiny bumps on your skin like I did, this clears them up in weeks!

reviews.title: Super cleanser
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for a while. Most times with other products it leaves a product residue. This one makes My face actually feel clean.

reviews.title: Wonderful cleanser
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser for me it works like a high dollar cleanser but it's so affordable. I love how clean it makes my skin feel without drying it out.

reviews.title: Love. Cleans Great.
reviews.review_text: My facial routine is Holy Hydration line. The cleanser leaves my face feeling clean, fresh and bright. I have the mini for travel and regular size for daily use. Also, a little goes a long way. Great Product

reviews.title: Favorite cleanser
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser. It's affordable, doesnt dry out my skin and I feel like has improved my acne. The bottle lasts a while too and I used it 2x a day.

reviews.title: Decent cleanser
reviews.review_text: Works well for my dry/sensitive skin. Especially if I use a makeup remover first. I personally love suds when I wash my face, which this product doesn't give. No fault of the product, just a personal preference.

reviews.title: Super gentle yet effective cleanser
reviews.review_text: A cleanser so gentle that it doesn't sting my eyes yet manages to deep clean. This cleanser removes every bit of makeup, setting spray, and facial lotions I use with just a few moments of scrubbing. It does all this without drying out my skin.

reviews.title: Every day cleanser
reviews.review_text: My go to every day. Does not dry my face or break my face out. A lot for your money. A little goes a long way (between nickel & dime size). I put some on an exfoliating hand mitt, gently buff, rinse and finish my routine.

reviews.title: Love this face wash!
reviews.review_text: This is the only face wash I use. Everything else causes me to break out, but the Holy Hydration! line cleans and moisturizes my skin without breakouts!

reviews.title: Love it Love it Love it
reviews.review_text: Wow! I am thoroughly impressed with this product. I love the scent and the feel of this cleanser. !t certainly does what it says. My skin feels clean and hydrated after use. I follow it up with the toner, the daily moisturizer and eye cream. I am so happy I ordered this. Thank you e.l.f. For really stepping up your game! You've got a lifelong customer in me

reviews.title: So disappointing
reviews.review_text: This is the only elf product that I can't recommend. First off, the smell is too strong,and very unpleasant. The soap itself is incredibly drying. My skin is so tight afterwards it is uncomfortable. I thought that perhaps it was just hard to rinse off, so I tried it in the shower. Nope, still dry as old leather. I wish elf offered refunds.

reviews.title: The perfect balance finally!
reviews.review_text: It is SO hard to find a cleanser that both feels like it actually works to clean your face but doesn't leave you feeling squeaky clean and dry. This one is excellent! It has a jelly soft texture and has a bubble foam when worked onto the face. I have combo skin and this leaves me feeling clean and soft. Never tight or greasy. I'm super impressed with this Holy Hydration line. I thought it would be either too much for my skin or just basic but it's really spectacular and I find myself going back to it most days over other products.

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin- oily on my nose and chin but dry everywhere else. This cleanser cuts down my greasy areas yet doesn't strip them, but my drier areas feel refreshed and soft. I've also noticed my chin hasn't broken out once since using this cleanser. I will definitely repurchase. It does foam up nicely and feels great during cleansing. Beware of the slight scent if you're sensitive to that. I recommend trying it if you haven't!

reviews.title: Love
reviews.review_text: Purchased this 1 month ago, use it daily morning and night and even after the cleansing balm when its my night to double cleanse. I was nervous initially as i have sensitive skin but no irritation post use. it lathers nicely, does not sting the eyes it has no strong scent, and it is not stripping of natural oils.

reviews.title: My favourite cleanser!
reviews.review_text: Got it! Here's a shorter and more accurate review: **e.l.f. Hydration Daily Cleanser: Your Skin's New Bestie! 💧** This cleanser is a total game-changer! It's super gentle, lathers perfectly, and leaves my skin feeling refreshed and hydrated without that tight, dry feeling. It melts away makeup and dirt like a dream, leaving my face soft, smooth, and clean. Plus, it's budget-friendly, so you can get that glow without spending a fortune. If you want a simple, effective cleanser that won't strip your skin, this is a must-have! 10/10 🌟

reviews.title: Best cleanser I've used
reviews.review_text: I don't know what magic is in here, but I break out from a lot of cleansers, this cleanser, NOT ONE SPOT. This is the only new product in my routine. It doesn't dry my dry skin out more, it has a smooth and silky texture, all around great product and it's only SIX dollars. I found my cleanser for life. Elf's skincare used to break me out, whatever you all did, keep it up.

reviews.title: Newbie review
reviews.review_text: I'm not normally a review writer but I was so impressed with this cleanser I felt I had to hype it up. I have used another well known brand for years and kept reading this product was a great match. It's great on my skin, has left my skin feeling super cleansed and fresh. The price difference is less than half of other cleanser so was debating could it be as good. I can honestly say this is one of the best products I have used and will be swapping to this cleanser from now on.

reviews.title: Best Cleanser I have found!!
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It's not too drying, has a very light scent, and removes the last vestiges of makeup like a champ! Most important? I've been using it for over a month and not once has it irritated my super sensitive skin. Please never stop making this!

reviews.title: Gaaaaame changer
reviews.review_text: The e.l.f. Holy Hydration Cleanser is a game-changer for my skincare routine. It leaves my skin feeling soft, clean, and refreshed without stripping away moisture. I love how gentle it is, even on my sensitive skin, and the light, fresh scent is a nice bonus. A little goes a long way, making it super affordable and long-lasting. Overall, it's the perfect daily cleanser for anyone looking for hydration and a healthy glow.

reviews.title: Perfect gentle cleanser for dry skin!
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser! I have sensitive dry skin, and this cleanses my face without stripping it and leaving me with dry patches. After washing my face, my skin doesn't immediately tighten anymore and by the time I find my face towel my skin still feels hydrated. It also lasts forever, I'm still on my first bottle and I bought it several mago! Definitely recommend, and you can't go wrong with the price either! 💕

reviews.title: love it
reviews.review_text: super foamy, a little goes a long way. hydrating, gets makeup off easily, cheap, and cleared my skin
I really love the product, it has an amazing formula thst is easy to use. However I wish I got more product for the price.
I waited till my face dried to see if it would leave a drying feeling and it didn't also not bad for the price

It is an awesome product. I am a very picky person when it comes to facial products, but this is definitely working out for me.

reviews.review_text: I was in the market for a new cleanser and a friend recommended this. It is gentle on my normal skin type but effective in getting any grime from my day off my face before bed. I'm very happy with it and plan to keep using it.

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.review_text: This is a great product other than sometimes I get it in mouth on accident haha. I definitely recommend this product if you are looking for a face wash.

reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing and very affordable! It leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated. It works great with the holy hydration moisturizer as well!

reviews.title: Drying!
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this based off reviews. I have combo skin and the dryness is always worse in the winter. After using this product, my skin became even drier and started flaking.

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.review_text: This is my dream cleanser! Please never get rid of this!! So hydrating for a cleanser and never bothers my sensitive skin. It would be great if this came in a larger size too!

reviews.title: Holy elfing Hydration!!
reviews.review_text: I used to spend top dollar on skin care and realize now I'm paying for the name. I use the entire holy hydration line and my skin has never been better. I recommend e.l.f. Products to everyone that comments how great my skin looks. Thank you!!

reviews.title: This cleanser is a great basic cleanser
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! It's great for combo skin, and very gentle. My only qualm is the packaging. I wish it was a pump or soft squeeze bottle. I find it hard to get everything out.

reviews.title: Gentle Cleanser
reviews.review_text: I really like this product! It's an effective cleanser that leaves your skin feeling clean yet soft. It has a smooth, makeup type scent - not medicine scented as cleansers often are.

reviews.title: Drying!!!!!
reviews.review_text: Bought this cleanser because it said that it could be used on dry skin but after washing with it once it left my skin so tight and feeling stripped of any moisture. I tried it a second time and the same thing happened so I'm not using it again.

reviews.title: Would recommend
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It takes my makeup off with no fuss and doesn't irritate my eyes or my skin. For such a great price too, it's one of my favorite cleansers I've tried yet.

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.review_text: I had a sample of this sitting around and I took it in the shower when I ran out of my regular cleanser. I had been testing a new foundation so I had a full face of foundation when I hopped in the shower. I was expecting to have to do a follow-up wash out of the shower but my face was fully clean. I bought a full sized bottle shortly after

reviews.title: Finally a makeup cleanser that works!
reviews.review_text: I have been trying all different brands of cleansers that claim to remove makeup. This one is mikes ahead of the rest, I can see my foundation coming off when I wash and the towel is clean when I dry my face. It does not dry my skin out or make it feel greasy. I'll be sticking with this one.

reviews.title: Made my face numb??
reviews.review_text: I've never had this issue with skincare before but after washing my face with this cleanser my face would tingle and then go numb. When I touched my skin, it would just feel so strange and tingly. I don't know how to fully describe it but it was just not a good feeling along with reddness. I gave the product a few tries just in case it was something else but every time, the same thing happened. Again, I have had no issues with any other products and have used Hyaluronic Acid before! So weird, just be aware that it might react weirdly with your skin.

reviews.title: Absolutely love it!!!
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this face cleanser, and I'm absolutely thrilled with the results! It leaves my skin feeling incredibly clean and refreshed without any dryness. The gentle formula is perfect for daily use, and I've noticed a significant improvement in my complexion. Highly recommend to anyone looking for an effective and soothing face cleanser!

reviews.title: Super Cleanser!
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is very effective at removing makeup and sweat after I workout. However, it doesn't strip my face and make it feel dry. I really love the flip-top, so I can take it with me in my gym bag or pack it for trips. I don't have to worry about it spilling. This face wash is a super value for the price.

reviews.title: Soft, refreshing skin!
reviews.review_text: I use this twice a day, it helps with my dry skin; it doesn't over moisturize, like other products, thus it also helps with breakouts! This is a great moisturizing facial wash plus for such a thrifty price it is a hidden gem amongst all the other expensive beauty products.

reviews.title: My ALL TIME Favourite!
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favourite cleanser... and I've tried them all! From the super expensive to the basic drugstore brands, I believe the Holy Hydration cleanser to be the best! My skin always feel super clean, but not stripped, after using. Also, you can use the TINIEST amount and you still get a great lather. There is just a tiny hint of scent, nothing overpowering. I really LOVE this cleanser!

reviews.title: Smells terrible!
reviews.review_text: I guess it cleanses well, but the odor lingers after washing and drying face....still smells the next morning. Wish I'd listened to the one reviewer who talked about the smell. I only bought it because the cleanser I'd liked and bought previously, the website wouldn't let me add that one to my cart/bag.

reviews.title: Fine
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is average, not too stripping, cleanses well, isn't particularly amazing.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.review_text: Great for all skin types! Lathers amazingly! Definitely buying again

reviews.review_text: it dried out my skin too much as I have very sensitive skin. not for me

reviews.title: Holy Grail of cleansers
reviews.review_text: My skin is combo and breakout prone and as a bonus, I occasionally suffer from bouts of eczema. It's rare that I find a cleanser that removes my makeup thoroughly without drying out my skin or causing an eczema flare. Holy Hydration liquid cleanser does a fine job and you can't beat the price! I use this twice a day and have had no issues with breakouts or sensitivity. I only have two (small) gripes about the product. The packaging could use a revamp. A flip-top bottle is not ideal. I found a pump dispenser that fits the neck of the bottle perfectly and solved that problem. The other issue is the scent. It's not offensive, but it is a bet chemical-ish. It's not strong and doesn't linger at all so this is a very minor point, but if it had no discernable fragrance it would be perfection. Still, it's one of the best cleansers I've ever found for my skin. Two thumbs up!

reviews.title: The Cleanser That Everyone Needs!
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is for everyone! No matter what skin type you have, this cleanser will work perfectly for you! I love this cleanser because it is gel in consistency, removes my makeup so easily, and feels so good on the skin! It doesn't leave my skin too dry and doesn't break me out. I can make one bottle last me about a month when I use it every single day, two times a day. If you are not using a cleanser, you need to start. Even if you do not wear makeup, you still need to wash the dirt and grime that accumulates on your face! This Holy Hydration Daily Cleanser is a 10/10!

reviews.title: My Dry Skin Loves It
reviews.review_text: This product is great for cleaning my dry skin. This cleanser doesn't make your skin feel tight or dehydrated after cleansing. I'm already on my second bottle. These last for a while though. I bought my first one back in December and I just now repurchased in March.

reviews.title: Skin soft as silk!
reviews.review_text: I got this as 2 samples and ordered after using it for a week. I'm excited to get the product. Just using this product alone makes my skin feel smooth as silk. It is very hydrating. I actually love the smell. I have to be careful with scented products because they can irritate my skin but this doesn't at all. I wish it came in a pump bottle though. It's not a thick product and you don't use much so I'm waiting to see if this product is hard to use in this container.

reviews.title: This cleanser is amazing!!
reviews.review_text: Just tried this for the first time. I must say I am rather impressed. It felt like I was rubbing cashmere over my face while I was applying it, rinsed off very easily, and left my face feeling clear, soft, and firm.
