reviews.review_text: so good for price. been using for over a month now can definitely see the improvement in my skin. will 100% be repurchasing. lost a star because it is not an overly large bottle

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.review_text: Been using this for a few months and I really like the whole Holy Hydration line. Sometimes it doesn't get all the stubborn eye makeup but the cream cleansing balm works great for that stuff

reviews.title: New to me product, that I am in love with.
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a bonus on an order I placed, I would not have ordered it on my own, but I'm so glad elf sent it as a sample. I have sent come back and replenished my order with three bottles. Sincerely, impressed!

reviews.title: So good cleared my skin
reviews.review_text: I got this cleanser a few months ago and I absolutely loved it. It cleared up my skin and really hydrated it too. I have dry skin and this really helped i loved definitely recommend!

reviews.title: Great cleanser!
reviews.review_text: I bought this a few mo muths ago and have been using it daily. Lasts long and is a good consistency. Clean smell, feels great on the skin. Would recommend for sensitive skin like mine.

reviews.title: Good product!
reviews.review_text: My face is usually super sensitive but this didn't seem to bother my face. It wasn't as harsh as some other face creams and it was very lightly scented so it didn't bother my sinuses either!

reviews.title: Clean, but not stripped
reviews.review_text: Wow! I've used this cleanser 4 times and let me tell you... I'm already obsessed. It helped get makeup off like a champ, and left my skin feeling clean, but not deprived of moisture. 10/10

reviews.title: Removes makeup
reviews.review_text: I got this about a month ago in a sample. I use it after the balm and it makes my face feel really clean afterwards. I then moisturize my face after. Haven't had any brake outs from it.

reviews.title: Not what I expected
reviews.review_text: The consistency isn't very thick, it bubbles well. However, the smell was so overwhelming for me at first it felt like I could taste it. I did get used to it eventually but I am not fond of it. I don't think it worked well for my oily/combination skin. Overall I expected more from the product,

reviews.title: I Love this cleanser!
reviews.review_text: I bought this about a week ago, and have only been using the holy hydration line since (& the pimple pen). And seriously my face feels so good. I typically have oily skin with & get break outs every now & then (especially that time of the month) well it's that time & my face has never felt better. I'm hooked!

reviews.title: Nice Cleanser
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for roughly a month, and I haven't fully formed an opinion, but I like it so far. I have acne prone skin and recently started a new skincare regimen (skin cycling) so my skin is definitely purging, however I don't think it is related to using this product. I wanted to simplify my skincare routine, and this cleanser seemed like a good place to start. In the morning I use Panoxyl and then this at night followed by skin cycling step. Love the way this is hydrating and makes my skin feel.

reviews.title: Good basic cleanser
reviews.review_text: I like using this cleanser alternating with the cosrx morning cleanser in the daytime. It does have a fragrant smell, but I don't minding since I'm washing it off. I like trying cleansers, so I'm not entirely sure I would repurchase this one, at least not soon.

reviews.title: Cleans really well
reviews.review_text: I use this cleanser as a deep cleanse with a spin brush and I find it is a thinner gel consistency but it does a great job. I don't use too much because it would be a waste of product. I really like that it has Hyluronic acid and niacinamide to protect my skin from the elements....

reviews.title: Stripping for my Dry Skin
reviews.review_text: Overall this is an okay cleanser but can be a little stripping on my dry skin, especially in the winter. I only use it now when its really humid or want a deep cleanse which isn't often. The value for the amount you get is good, just wish it worked for my skin type. Might be worth a try if you have oily skin.

reviews.title: So Soft!
reviews.review_text: I honestly didn't expect much from this cleanser, and only bought it because I was on vacation and had left my Origins cleanser at home. Well I'm definitely going to be stocking up when I get back because wow! It takes off makeup very well, including my waterproof mascara and eyeliner, and it leaves the skin so so soft. My skin is noticeably hydrated and supple, and it softens without leaving a sticky or residue feeling. I have fair oily skin for reference, it also pairs well with the primers i've used and doesn't cause my makeup to break up. 10/10, gonna have to try the other products in this line now.

reviews.title: Best Cleanser
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best cleanser I have ever used. And I have tried A LOT. Mostly drugstore brands like Clean & Clear, St.Ives etc. I use this cleanser every day usually once in the morning and once before bed. I follow it up with the Keep Your Balance Toner and the Holy Hydration Fragrance Free Cream. This has changed my skin for the better. I have combination skin, usually pretty dry but in my T zone it's oily. This is such a lightly purifying cleanser that is not harsh on the skin. This line is my favourite and forever go too. Highly recommend. The only thing I would change is the packaging. I wish they had a bigger size or at least a pump for it.

reviews.title: Good cleanser but not for me
reviews.review_text: I'll start by saying I have very sensitive skin and most elf products work well for me. Sadly this one did not. It lathers great and leaves the skin feeling well cleaned however it caused intense dryness and itching to my eyelids. I so wanted this to work for me.

reviews.title: I'm really surpised
reviews.review_text: I had been using the same brand of cleanser for 10 years and it was discontinued. I was ordering a mascara when this cleanser was a free ad on. I honestly was not expecting much since the ance face wash was a bust, but this stuff is amazing. I paired this cleanser with eye cream and the zit spot treatment and my skin is smoother and softer. I have been using it for less than 30 days but I see a huge difference.

reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample in my order and all I can say is please don't use it if you have sensitive skin. Shortly after washing my face with this, I broke out in red blotches. It took about two days to clear up. Not sure what's in this product, but I won't be trying again.

reviews.title: better options
reviews.review_text: I struggle with dry skin and I loved this at first. however over time I noticed that it seemed to be dying out my skin or not fixing the dryness. I prefer the pure skin cleanser more and my skin looks way better using that instead of the holy hydration cleaner.

reviews.title: This cleanser has replaced my regular go-to!
reviews.review_text: I have used Cetaphil for over 25 years but decided to try some other facial cleansers after hitting perimenopause. My skin is normally combination but lately has been either overly oily in the T-zone or drier by the sides of the eyes and cheeks. I saw the Holy Hydration! Daily Cleanser and liked that it contained hyaluronic acids that help hydrate the skin and ceramides that keep moisture locked in. I used a dime size amount on makeup free skin and I felt refreshed but not tight or greasy. The gel has wonderful slip and I spent time working in the product and giving myself a mini facial massage. I didn't notice any strong fragrance and my skin was left clean, hydrated and glowing. I have replaced my regular go-to cleanser with this one and I actually prefer this packaging with the snap lid. It's usually so hard to get the last amount of product that has a pump dispenser. With the snap lid, I just turn the bottle upside down to get all the product out.

reviews.title: Can't Get Past The Smell
reviews.review_text: Decided to give this a try and as soon as I foamed it up and applied it to my face the smell was overwhelming. It reminds me of lice shampoo or boxed dye. O have a hard time believing that many people at the company approved of this and thought, “yeah, this is a smell the consumer will enjoy all over their face.” My face did feel clean (it was a bit drying. though) so that's alright.

reviews.title: Makes my skin dry
reviews.review_text: This face wash seems to make my face feel and look really dry and dull. I have the entire Holy Hydration! line and I love every product (except this). I much prefer the daily face wash over this one; it feels more lightweight and doesn't make me feel dry or look dull.

reviews.title: Great for a starting product
reviews.review_text: You know pushing 40 and with two very demanding kids I needed some sort of great and simple skin routine to help with my aging face. A friend of mine recommended this cleanser and toner and honestly 4 months into an actual simple skin care routine and I've never looked back. This is a great cleanser which helps hydrate and plum the skin.

reviews.title: My favorite cleanser!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I'm getting very close to 40 😳and have been searching for some good quality skin care products for my aging face. This is gentle, smells divine and not strongly scented and suds up like a dream. I will recommend and continue to buy!!

reviews.title: Best Cleanser Ever!!!!
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for over a year now, and I have to say it's one of the best cleansers that I've ever used. I suffer from rosacea and usually break out from other products, but this one does not give me any breakouts. I totally recommend this product as I have purchased them for myself and gifts.

reviews.title: Best cleanser so far!
reviews.review_text: So far, I would say this cleanser is the best I've used so far. It cleanses my face without drying it out, and it contains ingredients that benefit the skin. I also love that it's not high on fragrance, as many cleansers tend to be over-advertised for their fragrance rather than their effectiveness. I haven't used this product for very long, hence the 4/5, but I think it'll continue to work great. Super happy with my purchase!

reviews.title: Made me have a very bad powerful red rash on face.
reviews.review_text: So I got the travel kit of all the jet set hydration, but also got this as a free product in my package. I tried the free one. For the next two days, my cheeks broke out in severe acne and red blotches and my face got really heated. I have two auto immune diseases. Lupus being highly one of them. I honestly thought it was a flare up. I was just about to try it from the bag again but I'm worried. And I don't want to go trying the other in the jet set bag products if this might have an ingredient that flares up auto immune diseases. Any other products I have zero issues with yet. But this one I'm definitely very hesitant to try from the jet. Set, along with the others. I'll have to research what ingredient it could possibly be. Usually I don't have any bad reactions to e.l.f products. I would recommend maybe if you can return it, refund or get advised to replace it with another product of theirs or get advised on what ingredient it might be but I'm not icon tier yet.

reviews.title: Amazing product!
reviews.review_text: I bought this a few months ago and it has already worked SO well. It's very easy to apply, and the price is very affordable. It's not too big, and it has made my skin much more hydrated and healthy. I definitely recommend this to others looking for a hydrating, affordable cleanser.

reviews.title: Non Drying
reviews.review_text: The Holy Hydration cleanser is a really nice everyday cleanser. My skin feels clean, but not dried out after using. My skin looks great and I haven't experienced any irritation while using. The scent is pleasant and not overpowering to me. You also get a good amount for the price.

reviews.title: Super hydrating
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin. After washing my face my skin becomes flakey and tears with simple movements. I get some eczema on my face in the winter as well. After my showers and washing my face, I'd have to run to grab moisturizer. I started using this product and I no longer had to rush. One time I forgot to put on moisturizer and didn't get the painful dry stretchy feeling until after an entire hour. This stuff works, my only complaint is that the product is very runny, so when I first started using it I tried to get a little bit and a bunch came out. if it were a little thicker and easier to apply and not lose a lot of product would have 5 stars from me.

reviews.title: Treat-Your-Skin
reviews.review_text: I just started using the Holy Hyration Cleanser as a part of the Holy Hyraftion skin care line about 2 weeks about now and my skin is totally in love! The cleanser is gentle and lathers easily leaving my skin feeling so clean without stripping my face of moisture. Im someone with very sensitive, combination skin. Prone to break-outs, redness and dryness. Yet, i have had no sensitivity or break-outs with using the Holy Hydration Cleanser and my skin has never looked or felt better. Going forward I have already ordered ny second bottle of the Holy Hydration Cleaner (and face moisturizer, but thats another review) and plan to keep it as an key part of my skin care regimne.

reviews.title: The best ever
reviews.review_text: There is not another face wash I have used like this one. This has changed the way I do my skincare routine and how I treat my skin. This wash is perfect. This whole line by elf is perfect and has made me fall in love with my skin finally. I try to never skip a day of washing my face thanks to this wash. I have fallen in love with now having a face wash I love and look forward to using.

reviews.title: Quite good for waterproof make-up
reviews.review_text: This is my first step in double cleansing. I am impressed that it removed most of my waterproof make-up. I prefer to wear waterproof eyeliner, whether it is a pencil or liquid liner. With my waterproof pencil liner, this cleanser removes all of it without leaving my skin feeling dry. As for my waterproof liquid liner, a few more drops of the cleanser with more vigorous scrubbing, it helps removes most of it. I am definitely continuing this as my first double cleanser. And for its value, I can't go wrong with it!

reviews.title: The BEST face cleanser EVER
reviews.review_text: I got this first in the trial size *mini size* to try it out and after the first wash I was amazed and after the second and so on I couldn't believe how soft and smooth it left my face!! So needless to say after the first couple washes I quickly bought the bigger bottle and have been using this faithfully for a year and the holy hydration skin care line is my favorite.. E.L.F. PLEASE MAKE THIS IN A BIGGER BOTTLE PLEASE!!! It's not overly priced and is absolutely wonderful, my pre teen daughter uses it as she has very oily skin and very VERY sensitive skin and this doesn't break her out at all or irritate her skin in any way!! I definitely 10000% would recommend this product!! And the whole holy hydration line!!

I used this product for the first time and I was excited about it and it made my face feel really lathered not bothered and clean after I finish it will lather on a rag really well but it says you can use your hands it's a nice product for the price I will try the rest of the skin line

reviews.title: Guys, guys, it removes my eyeshadow
reviews.review_text: I got this as an ELF gift for their incredible, great marketing, selling free gift/week for the last two months of the year and was pleasantly surprised. BRo, it removes my makeup. My FULL EYESHADOW makeup looks like a meling balm but in a gel consistency. AND, it does not burn my eyes. I have dry skin and admit that it is not the most hydrating. But, it's not totally stripping. If you've used the La Roche Posay, it's less drying than that. But for the value, and amount of product, this might just replace my melting makeup balm. It's really THAT good. I use this and then go in with a gentle cleanser for a double cleanse. I can't believe there's a product of this conssitenly that removes makeup so well. I apply it on dry skin and gradually add water.

reviews.title: It works but...
reviews.review_text: This product works well however I think that it drys out my skin a bit more than I am used to but in combination with the other products its fine. Also the packaging reminds me of those acrylic paints you get from the art store so I'm not a huge fan of that.

reviews.title: I love this cleanser
reviews.review_text: I will definitely be purchasing again. I love this cleanser. It only takes a couple drops to was your face and it cleanses so well. I have oily skin and this product is perfect for my skin. A little goes a long way because it lathers so well. My new favorite cleanser.

reviews.title: Super drying for me
reviews.review_text: I LOVE e.l.f. and switched my skincare over from high end brands to mainly e.l.f. after falling in love with the Holy Hydration Eye Cream & Triple Bounce Serum. I now use their retinol, peel pads & about 80% of my makeup is now e.l.f. I am a beauty writer and esthetician of over 25 years and believe that it is the INGREDIENTS that matter over fancy packaging and slick ads. I am a huge fan! However, this is one of just two products from the brand I don't love and won't repurchase. I have normal to dry skin and have been using LRP cleaner — I had high hopes, but this formula just zapped all the moisture from my skin, leaving it super dry. My 19 year old is now using it on his oily skin and is enjoying it. This one is just not for me. I still love everything else from e.l.f. & no one can believe that I am not using medical grade skincare because my skin is so fresh and dewy looking. Give this cleanser a try - it is well formulated - just not right for my skin.

reviews.title: Not for dry skin
reviews.review_text: Elf says that this product is fine for all skin types and said that the Holy Hydration line is good for dry, aging skin, however, I have skin on the drier side and would not recommend. The cleanser suds up and my skin does feel cleansed however it leaves my facing feeling a little dried out or tight, therefore I don't believe it is suited for dry skin. Don't love nor hate this product, but I won't be repurchasing.

reviews.title: Great basic facial cleanser
reviews.review_text: I like this cleanser a lot, it's not too expensive and it works well for me. I have sensitive, combo skin that is maturing (I'm 38, light combo skin, never had any cosmetic procedures/treatments) and it doesn't dry me out, doesn't irritate my skin. My face feels clean and not stripped after I use it. Some cleansers leave my skin feeling tight and dry, but this one doesn't do that. I think this would be good for a lot of different skin types. I've been using elf products since they started and I've been happy with nearly everything since 2004. This is another product I enjoy and will continue to use because it's so gentle on my cranky, finicky skin.

reviews.title: Amaziingggggg!!!!!!
reviews.review_text: I love love love love love this cleanser after searching for about 3 years I've finally found a cleanser that isn't harsh and works great for my skin I have combination skin and it's sooo hard to find something that doesn't dry my skin and doesn't make my skin all oily this is it it's just perfect leaves my skin feeling clean and fresh every time

reviews.title: Good for dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample. It's a pretty basic cleanser that's gentle enough for daily use and easily removes makeup: the only difference I've noticed between it and others is that, unlike some cleansers, this one doesn't leave your skin feeling tight/dry after using it. I'm not a big fan of fragrance in cleansers, but this one has a mild clean scent that didn't bother my sensitive skin too much.

reviews.title: STOLE MY HEART
reviews.review_text: ONE OF MY FAVORITE CLEANSERS!! I love the feeling of this, i use it after the oil balm cleanser as a double cleanse and morning cleanse, and i just feeling of this one. It doesn't leave a residue and leaves my skin feeling nice and clean. Definitely repurchasing for school!! I'd recommend this product.

reviews.title: The best
reviews.review_text: All I can say is I love it so much will be ordering more

reviews.title: Great Daily Cleanser
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It makes my face feel nice and soft and doesn't dry me out.

reviews.review_text: I continue buying this cleanser, is the best one I've tried and will keep on repurchasing for sure!

reviews.review_text: I like the cleanser. My only thing is that I wish my face felt softer after use.

reviews.review_text: Bought this cleanser a few weeks ago and I absolutely love it. Makes my face feel so clean!!!

reviews.review_text: I like it you only need to use a little and it foams alot not for super dry skin tho

reviews.review_text: I have been using elf Holy hydration products for about 2 months now. LOVE this cleanser. Gentle but effective, and a nice light scent!

reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser leaves me feeling clean but refreshed. This just might be my go-to cleanser from now on.

reviews.title: Yes please

reviews.review_text: I really like this product however the scent is off putting and I wish that would it was toned down for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_text: I bought this a few days away and I don't know why I haven't bought it before washes with out drying my faces

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.review_text: I've used this product for 1 month and my skin is for sure 10 times clearer than when I didn't use it! 5 stars!

reviews.title: Love Holy Hydration daily cleanser!
reviews.review_text: I bought this cleanser hoping it would leave my face feeling clean, but not dry. I was not disappointed. My skin felt clean and soft. Love it.

reviews.title: So soft
reviews.review_text: This product is so smooth and soft on the skin. Felt really clean after using. Does have a strong fragrance though.

reviews.title: Nice Daily Cleanser
reviews.review_text: Good Cleanser. Not super drying. Works well with a cleansing balm or oil before it to get everything.

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.review_text: Omg I am in love with this cleanser. My skin felt clean, refreshed and hydrated. Absolutely great! I will be buying again.

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.review_text: Good cleanser doesn't over strip the face. The down side doesn't deep clean, but is a good cleanser for natural makeup lovers. For best results it works perfectly with the Holy Hydration Cleansing Balm.

reviews.title: Gentle on my sensitive skin!
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin (rosacea) and this has been gentle. Very happy to find another face cleanser that works with my skin! Only need a dime size amount per use too!

reviews.title: Feels great
reviews.review_text: I have super dry skin and this helped it a lot! It also didn't break me out or cause my skin to feel dry after cleansing. This happens with a lot of cleansers. Will be purchasing again!!

reviews.title: I really love this!
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin and even with using a silicone scrubber, this didn't hurt or burn my face. That's a big thing for me and I'm so happy to have it!

reviews.title: So glad I tried it
reviews.review_text: I wasn't expecting much because my skin is very oily and waxy and holds onto everything. It takes some serious shot to get everything off my face. when I rinsed it off, everything was gone and my face felt softer and younger. Highly recommend
i usually use cerave and it has worked good for me i likt his product because it doesnt burn my eyes and its gentle and doesnt leave my face dry which i love

reviews.title: Love this so much!
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite skincare content creators tried and reviewed this cleanser and she was blown away with not only the ingredients/formulation but how well it worked. I LOVE this cleanser so much!!! Def recommend!!

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.review_text: Forever my favorite facial cleanser. It's easy on the skin, but strong enough to clear away all the impurities. Definitely a staple to my skin care routine. You can't beat the price!

reviews.title: Skeptic turned fan
reviews.review_text: I'm new to elf skincare and this definitely lived up to the hype! Hydrating as promised but thoroughly cleansing as well. It does have a slight scent but nothing too overbearing. I like it!

reviews.title: Hydrating
reviews.review_text: This product was very hydrating. I was honestly suprised it didnt strip me skin because it is on the cheaper side but it didnt. I love this cleanser so much 10/10

reviews.title: Decent cleanser
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin, and this is incredibly gentle on it. I use it 3 times a week and a small drop does the job, especially since I am not wearing makeup. Ive had the same bottle for months and it lasts forever for the price.

reviews.title: Nope...smell and reaction
reviews.review_text: The smell is so strong. I cannot stand it. It's sweet. When I wash near my nose or mouth, the scent is overbearing. On top of that, I break out with this so bad. I can't use this!

reviews.title: Non irritating
reviews.review_text: I've had this cleanser for about 2 months, I use it daily it doesn't cause eye irritation, burning or feel like it's taking my skin off. It does the job and my skin likes it.

reviews.title: Love! Can be drying though
reviews.review_text: This is a great cleanser! Good for oily ski bc I'd say after your first step of a double cleanse? It can tend to be a tad stripping so be sure to moisturize!
My skin is so oily and i never could find a product to help with the oil and when i used this it helped so much i use it very night and it makes the oil go away and makes my skin so smooth

reviews.title: Love this cleanser!
reviews.review_text: Bought this Holy Hydration Cleanser to go with the Holy Hydration face cream I bought for my daughter's Xmas stocking. She loves the combination of both products!She said it left her skin super silky! Definitely a great choice.

reviews.title: Perfect perfect perfect
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for years now, it does not have a strong odor, does not irritate my skin. I normally have very sensitive skin but this doesn't irritate it, and does not dry out your face.

reviews.title: good
reviews.review_text: I love it I usually put it on before my make up kind of as a primer and works wonderfully. however, if u don't like the sticky feeling the product might not be for you.

reviews.title: Very Good Cleanser
reviews.review_text: I really like the Holy Hydration line and this was one product I did not have. I use it and alternate with the cleansing balm. I feel like this really gets all the makeup off without stripping your skin. Will definitely buy again.

reviews.title: Amazing Cleanser
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for months. My skin looks really great. I use a facial cream after. My skin is very oily. This cleanser works well. It's reasonably priced. Which I love.

reviews.title: Cleans without stripping
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin. Most cleansers with leave it feeling oily or dry it out too much. Holy Hydration is perfect. It leaves my skin clean and smooth without a trace of dryness. I use it as part of my morning and evening routines.

reviews.title: Discontinued?!? Where is it?
reviews.review_text: I love this and it's gone from every store - even the shelf space for it is gone.now it's gone from the website, too. Is it just out of stock or is it gone forever? If so, why? Whyyyyy?

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: When Elf first came out with the hydration set, I had to get it! I'm glad I did. The formula is great and not overpowering like other cleansers I've tried. I will continue using it!

reviews.title: Cleans well

reviews.title: Decent power bank

Overall, this is a solid and stylish power bank for the price, and I'd definitely recommend it if you're looking for something dependable and travel-friendly!

More like 10Ah than 20Ah. But your mileage will vary depending of drawn current. I got more long term succes if my cell phone is already at 100% and I plug the power bank the whole day so phone battery never drains. In this case current drawn is 0.5A. If I let the cell phone deplete close to zero and plug the power bank to both charge and continue to use the phone, then I might get 1.5 charge during one day. In this case current drawn is 1.8A. Also performance decrese below 12oC (55F) and charge time increase. Below 0oC (32F) it's useless for high drain applications. It might still be usefull for load below 0.5A.

reviews.title: It Gets the Job Done

It's not the fastest when it comes to recharging itself either, so you have to plan ahead. The build quality is alright — feels a bit plasticky but hasn't given me any trouble so far. The size is pocket-friendly, which I like, and it's light enough to carry around in my bag. Overall, it's an okay backup option, but I wouldn't rely on it for heavy use or long trips. If you just need something basic for emergencies, this does the trick. --- If you'd like, I can tailor it to a specific model or your actual experience — just let me know!

reviews.title: Powers up my devices quickly and efficiently
reviews.review_text: This 20,000 mAh Portable Charger Power Bank is an absolute lifesaver! I purchased it for my iPhone and iPad, and it has exceeded all my expectations. The dual USB ports are incredibly convenient, allowing me to charge two devices simultaneously, and the charging speed is impressive—it powers up my devices quickly and efficiently. The compact and lightweight design makes it easy to carry in my bag without adding bulk. It's also well-built, with a sturdy exterior that feels durable and reliable. The power bank comes with a handy LED indicator that shows the remaining battery life, which is a thoughtful touch. Overall, this power bank is a fantastic investment for anyone looking for a dependable, high-capacity portable charger. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Bogus. Deceptive. False claims. 1/10.
reviews.review_text: Bogus. Not even close to 20, 000mah light and flimsy Way too thin to have a 20, 000mah cell. after extraditing the cell from its case, three charge/ discharge cycles show 8500-9300mah. The Charging board cuts out at 10-12 watts on electronic load. No "fast charge". no "Power Delivery". Also there is no thermistor on the pack, don't see pads for one either. Would not recommend. Will be returning the one I didn't rip apart to confirm these statements.

reviews.title: Small Size, Big Power

Capacity is excellent - charges my devices multiple times, quickly too. Dual USB ports are convenient. It's reliable, works with all my devices, and the LED indicator is handy. reviews.title: Solid reliable
reviews.review_text: I've been using the 20000 mAh Portable Charger Power Bank (Black), and it's quickly become a must-have in my travel bag and daily routine. It also works flawlessly with my iPad, Galaxy phone, and even my Pixel device. The dual USB ports are super convenient—I can charge two devices at once without sacrificing speed. It's a little on the heavier side, but that's expected for a battery pack with this kind of capacity. The design is sleek and simple, and the black finish looks good while resisting fingerprints and smudges. Whether you're traveling, working remotely, or just want peace of mind that you won't run out of juice during the day, this power bank gets the job done. Definitely worth the price for the power and reliability it provides

reviews.title: Life saver
reviews.review_text: This 20,000mAh portable charger is an absolute lifesaver and a must-have for anyone on the go. Here's why it stands out: 1. Massive Battery Capacity: With 20,000mAh, this power bank provides multiple full charges for my devices. It's perfect for long trips, busy days, or emergencies when I can't access a power outlet. 2. Dual USB Ports: The dual USB outputs are super convenient, allowing me to charge two devices simultaneously. Whether it's my iPhone and iPad or helping a friend charge their phone, it handles the load effortlessly. 3. Universal Compatibility: It works seamlessly with all my devices, including my iPhone, Galaxy, and even my tablet. No compatibility issues at all! 4. Sleek and Lightweight Design: Despite its large capacity, the power bank is slim and lightweight, making it easy to carry in my bag or pocket. The white finish gives it a clean and modern look. 5. Fast Charging: The charging speed is impressive! It charges my devices quickly and efficiently, saving me time when I'm in a hurry. 6. Durable and Reliable: It feels sturdy and well-made. I've been using it regularly, and it's proven to be reliable with no signs of wear or diminished performance. Overall, this portable charger is an excellent investment for anyone who needs a dependable and powerful power bank. It's affordable, versatile, and incredibly practical. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Cheap to point where it may be hazardous to use
reviews.review_text: Very cheap and I have a hard time believing that the capacity is as described. I purchased a battery with half the capacity as this one a few years ago for a little bit more money and it lasts longer and is much better quality. The one I have will charge my phone about 2 times, this one wont even charge it past 30%. When using this pack the usb port won't allow you to fully insert the chargers, which is distressing. Not to mention when charging the battery or charging with the battery, it gets unnervingly warm whereas the other 2 I own from different brands don't get warm at all.. For the price it's cheap enough to where I'm not worried about a return or a refund but I wouldn't recommend it, just spend a little bit more and get a battery that is much better quality. I thought I was getting a huge deal buying this item "on sale" but I really just ended up paying more than it's worth.

reviews.title: New formula is not improved
reviews.review_text: I have always liked this product. I was excited to get a new jar. I was nervous about the new formula. I am not a fan. It is a bit greasy. It is supposed to be fragrance free, but it has a bad smell. The old formula was richer and felt better. The old formula had a nice smell. New definitely does not mean improved. I read several other comments and reviews. I see that I am not the only one who was left disappointed.

reviews.title: Not for oily skin
reviews.review_text: I saw this on social media and it looked like it was amazing and for the price, how could you pass up this "amazing" and affordable jar? I have oily skin so I know sometimes creams don't work for me, this one definitely doesn't. It seems to absorb in but not fully and what doesn't absorb in, sits on the skin no matter how I try to massage it in. It does make some liquid makeup go on smoother but after about 30 min, my whole face is shiny and greasy looking. This would be perfect for people with dry skin, not so much for oily skin. Resorting to using this as a hand and neck treat.

I have used L'Oreal collagen for over 10 years. The old formula was amazing!! I'm not sure why they decided to change something that worked fabulously, but for whatever reason, they did. The new formula burns my face and feels like when I've used too much retinol, which is what I'm suspecting they may have put in the new formula. Whatever they are using is very harsh. I will be returning for a refund and will not continue to purchase in the future.
Leaving my face feeling soft and healthy, this cream is such a rich treat for my skin. I'm so glad that I have tried it. I will definitely keep this one. Please don't ever stop selling this.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.review_text: The new formula does not leave my skin feeling as moisturized as the old formula. The smell of the new formula is nice, but that's about all that I like. The new formula leaves a streaky residue on my skin, that doesn't go away no matter how long I rub it in. The residue also doesn't mesh well with makeup causing my makeup to separate, crack and ultimately dry out—something I never experienced with the old formula. The old formula left my face feeling moisturized all day long, but the new formula dries out. Overall I'm disappointed with the new formula. If you're going to purchase this face lotion I highly recommend you purchase the old formula. Old formula is 10/10, the new formula is 2/10.

It works great alone because I've noticed if applied with other products like SPF lotions or serums or a skin protectant, it tends to make cracks in the moisture barrier. However, applying makeup foundation over it seems to work pretty good. Overall, a really good product. The smell is really nice too. Very soft and subtle.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love doesn't even begin to describe how I feel about this collagen moisture filler from L'oreal. My skin is bouncy and firm with a youthful glow!! The collagen is helping my skin retain its natural moisture while adding hydrating qualities from L'Oréal's Purification process, wow!! My skin is deeply hydrated and healthy looking again, all thanks to this collagen filler. I really like that L'Oréal doesn't add any dyes or mineral oils and this moisturizer is not only paraben free but also allergy tested and safe for sensitive skin. From the moment you use this collagen filler you can feel it lock in the moisture, it absorbs quickly, isn't greasy, doesn't clog your pores and gives your skin forty eight hours of moisture. Nothing else that I have used can compare to how incredible this has my skin looking and feeling. I will definitely be purchasing this collagen filler over and over again, it is truly amazing!!

reviews.title: I love this product!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been using this product as part of my skincare routine in the morning and at night. It goes on so nicely and smells amazing! The one thing I did notice is that if I put too much on, it does make my face feel a little oily. A little goes a long way!

reviews.title: My skin has improved with this cheap cream - fact
reviews.review_text: I actually started seeing a difference in my skin after three days of using this. It's a fact. I don't know what it's doing to my face, but my skin looks better.

reviews.title: Good, like it, will buy again.
reviews.review_text: Does do what it says it does. Hydrates face for a good 24 hours. Smells great. I have rosacea and it did not interact with it adversely at all. Will buy again.
Love the travel size, feels wonderful on your face %26 nice fragrance,

reviews.title: Don't Pay More for Less
reviews.review_text: Ponds is supposedly one of the biggest selling products in the world ad I can see why! A very small amount does wonders for my skin!

reviews.title: Great Product
reviews.review_text: Only use small amount as round eyes. Not greasy very light and works great. Great size and price. Nice size for travel too.

reviews.title: My Go-to Daily Moisturizer in the Perfect Size Jar
reviews.review_text: If you have super dry skin like I do, the Pond's Crema S is something to consider adding to your skincare regime. It's creamy and really hydrating. This 1.75 oz size version is perfect for me, a) it keeps the cream fresh and hygienic; b) it is a great travel size. I keep one in my purse and one in my travel toiletries bag. I really hope Pond's decides to make this a permanent product size.

reviews.title: Return
reviews.review_text: I don't think they gave me the one I ordered. I needed the one that's for brown spots. I think the container is red. What do I do now? I have not opened it.

reviews.title: Incorrect cream received
reviews.review_text: I received the wrong cream and when I took it to Walmart they would not refund me for it. They said it didn't show that was the cream I received. I just wanted a refund for their mistake in sending it to me. What can do to get a refund?
Good product and perfect size to put in carry on bag for air travel.
appears to work. have been using mornings and nights but no big results as of yet.
The product itself was great but it did not carry the same smell. The smelled old.

reviews.title: In love
reviews.review_text: Pond's is a highly effective and excellent value moisturizer, especially for dry skin, living up to its 24-hour hydration claim. It has a rich, creamy texture that blends well, and comes in the classic, functional jar packaging. The light, clean, and classic Pond's scent rounds out this affordable and reliable skincare essential.

reviews.title: Amazing everyday moisturizer
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizer. It leaves the skin soft and glossy without any oily residue. The scent is soft and subtle and the cream melts into the skin nicely. It's also amazingly affordable at most stores and is a great everyday facial moisturizer.

reviews.title: Perfect for dry or combination skin
reviews.review_text: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ I've been using Pond's cream for a while now and I really love how it keeps my skin moisturized. It has a rich texture but absorbs quickly and leaves my face feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated all day. I also love the clean, classic scent. Perfect for dry or combination skin, especially during colder months. A staple in my skincare routine!

reviews.title: Really good for hydration
reviews.review_text: I've been using Pond's Crema S Humectante Nutritiva for a while now, and honestly, it's such a great moisturizer, especially for dry or combination skin. It has a creamy texture that feels rich but not too heavy, and it leaves my skin soft, hydrated, and fresh for hours.

reviews.title: Moisturizer
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Ponds S Humectante for over ten years, and it's still my go-to moisturizer. It's rich, creamy, and leaves my skin feeling soft and deeply hydrated without feeling greasy. I love how gentle it is I've used it through different seasons and skin changes, and it's always worked for me. It's one of those classic products that never lets you down. Affordable, reliable, and a staple in my skincare routine.

reviews.title: very moisturizing
reviews.review_text: This cream has maximum hydration that lasted 24 hours. Its texture is light, which leaves a shiny effect on the skin when applied. It is highly recommended for very dry skin since it provides a lot of hydration when applied.

reviews.title: Best Ever
reviews.review_text: The Ponds Crema 5 is the best ever I have been using it ever since it came out I still have a few big tubs left I use it morning and night! I am almost 59 yrs it keeps my face so moisturized and shiny and looking so hydrating! Truly Truly the best ever I hope u keep making these products! All I do is wash and moisturize day and night!! I want to try more products but this is what has been in my budget!! I mean after 19 surgeries I feel like I honestly do not look my age because of these wonderful products and I'm still blessed to be walking after all my health issues! Thank you so much for these wonderful amazing products that I will forever continue to use

reviews.title: Budget Friendly
reviews.review_text: It is rich and deeply hydrating — perfect for dry skin. The texture is thick but absorbs well. Ingredients like glycerin and vitamins leave skin soft and nourished. The scent is strong and classic. Simple jar packaging, though not the most hygienic. Great budget-friendly moisturizer.

reviews.title: Fresh and renewed
reviews.review_text: I like this moisturizer because it leaves my skin feeling fresh and is not heavy. Ponds has been around for years, and it lives up to its name's legacy.

reviews.title: Love
reviews.review_text: Started using this a month ago I think and I can't believe I never used it before. It helps so well with my dry skin near my nose. I have always had issues with that area. Doesn't have much of a scent maybe a slight clean smell. Packaging is very clean.

reviews.title: Perfect for dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST moisturizer ever! It took forever to find in stores but it's is so thick and makes my skin feel so soft. It's incredibly soothing and hydrating, and is amazing for the winter. It's got a really mild scent, which I personally appreciate. Will definitely buy again!

reviews.title: Great Facial Cream
reviews.review_text: Pond's Crema S 24-Hour Moisturizing Cream is designed to provide deep hydration for dry to very dry skin. Infused with natural botanical extracts and nutrients, it aims to nourish the skin, leaving it softer and healthier-looking. ￼ Pros: • Deep Hydration: Users appreciate its rich, creamy texture that effectively moisturizes, making it suitable for nighttime use or as a base under makeup. ￼ • Skin Softening: Many have noted that regular application results in smoother, more supple skin. ￼ • Affordability: The cream is budget-friendly and widely available, making it accessible for many. Great value for the size of the jar as well because a little bit goes a long way.

reviews.title: Good for your skin
reviews.review_text: “I've been using Ponds Creme for a while now, and I can confidently say it's a must-have for anyone looking to give their skin a nourishing treat. The formula is rich and moisturizing, making it perfect for dry or dull skin. It absorbs quickly, leaving a smooth, non-greasy finish that feels luxurious. I love how it makes my skin look radiant and refreshed. Plus, it's affordable and lasts a long time, which is always a plus! Whether you're using it day or night, Ponds Creme is a fantastic addition to your skincare routine. Highly recommended!”

reviews.title: Great moisturizer, awful smell
reviews.review_text: I bought a travel size of this cream after I forgot to take my regular moisturizer on a trip. I like the moisturizer itself but the scent is really gross. It reminds me of an air freshener you would use to try to cover up a bad smell like smoke or animal waste. It's hard to get past. I would love it if there was a version of this with a different scent or no scent.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: My friend kept asking me what I used on my face to keep the beautiful complexion. She could not believe this was the only moisturizer I used on my face. She searched my medicine cabinet looking for expensive facial moisturizers but couldn' t fine any except for Ponds.
Works wonderfully! Really keeps ones skin soft and moist. Doesn't wear down or off like a lot of creams.
I love how it keeps my skin hydrated, ans smooth all day! If your looking for a good moisturizer for dry skin, this is it!

reviews.title: Budget friendly, effective skincare
reviews.review_text: Ponds is an oldie but a goody! The crema s nourishes without feeling heavy. It is a wonderful product for those of us with dry or really dry skin. Ponds has an affordable price point.

reviews.title: Grandma's best kept secret
reviews.review_text: This cream has been in my family since my grandmother's time, who always had beautiful skin, and I continue to use it because it gives you incredible moisture., It's an excellent price for what it's worth.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: I decided to give this a try and I love it. Very light scent and goes in skin so well and keeps it moistureized thought the night and day. Helps my dry skin so much.

reviews.title: Hello hydrating skin
reviews.review_text: Very good moisturizer, it leaves my skin feeling soft and i absolutely love the smell to it. The texture feels so hydrating. This helped me out with my dry elbows.

reviews.title: Great buy and inexpensive!
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It feel light on my skin and it doesn't cause me any issues as I have sensitive skin! I love the texture it's not oily or noticeable yet my skin stays moisturized!

reviews.title: It didn't work on me
reviews.review_text: I have use this before but I stopped using it bc of my type of skin it was not working on me plus I have acne, the texture feels very hydrated so if you have a rough skin you should use it, it was not effective on me, but the scent is very good and the packaging is perfect on my opinion it is not too big or too small

reviews.title: One of my best choices for moisturizer
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer works wonderful

reviews.title: Great Buy
reviews.review_text: I like all of Pond's products. I would purchase again.

reviews.title: Awesome product
reviews.review_text: This product makes my skin feel smooth and healthy.

reviews.title: Makes Skin too Oily
reviews.review_text: Recommended by coworker. This product does not meet expectations as described by my coworker

reviews.title: Good item
reviews.review_text: Its a must have for everyone! Smooth, creamy, slick and sensual.

reviews.title: Trusted product
reviews.review_text: Trusted product, that works great. Keeps your face feeling moisturized and feeling soft.

reviews.title: It hydrates a lot for a long time i love it mmmmmm
reviews.review_text: Its texture is not very light, its compact packaging, as a result it hydrates all day and its fragrance is soft. Iove it and use all days ✅✅✅✅✅✅✅✅✅

reviews.title: Travel size
reviews.review_text: I actually use neutrogena but I traveld and forgot mine back home. I honestly like this was better an feel like is moisturized my face better than the product I was using

reviews.title: goodbye to my dry skin!
reviews.review_text: It is a good moisturizer, I love it because it leaves my skin feeling juicy, I use it in the morning and at night. It is very economical and can be found in any supermarket.

reviews.title: This product is great!
reviews.review_text: I bought the Ponds cream S of 200g. I was looking for a moisturizer for my face especially now that we are in fall and winter. My face skin gets really really dry and when I found ponds cream S it worked beautifully into my skin and face I have sensitive dry skin and I break out but with this cream I feel my skin very hydrated and soft glowing with no breakouts. My mother and grandma has use ponds products since forever and still use it. Thank you Ponds please keep making these products never stop it is amazing love it

reviews.title: Fantastic Moisturizer
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best moisturizer I have ever used. And I have used a lot. Have used the Dry Skin Cream and really liked it. However, this moisturizer is beats the dry skin cream hands down. I love the scent and the texture of this product. It feels wonderful on the skin. I use it in the morning on a freshly cleaned face. Then apply SPF and at night after cleansing. My face has never felt so good. I also think it makes my makeup last longer. Just for reference I am 52. Thank you for the beautiful product.

reviews.title: Keeps my skin from being dry and wrinkles
reviews.review_text: I am 83 yr old..my dad started me Ponds Dry skin cream when I was 10 years old..I was a beach baby..today people can not belive I am 83..I get fifty,s a lot..no surgery and usually with out make up..I recommend you consistently..Thanks so much Ponds..PJM

reviews.title: Amazing Stuff!
reviews.review_text: For years, I have been using expensive moisturizers, but none of them can beat Crema S for moisturizing my very dry, desert weathered skin. It isn't heavy, it isn't sticky, it isn't greasy, and it doesn't leave an unnatural oily 'glow' on my skin, like so many of the other creams and serums do. Why pay more for a big name, when you can get it all from Pond's?

reviews.title: My all-time favorite cream
reviews.review_text: This cream is such an old-school cream, but such a good cream. I put it on every single night after I shower and before I do my make up and my skin is so soft and so hydrated. I absolutely love using this cream and I have multiple versions of it and it's amazing ￼

reviews.title: 3rd generation to use this
reviews.review_text: I am 52. I’ve been using Pond’s for years. My Grammy is 97, she looks like she is in her 80’s. Her mother, my Nana, used Ponds. Maybe it is in our genes but we all look younger than our age. I got my husband using it, my daughter… it’s been around forever because it works! It’s a simple product to use, it’s affordable and easy to get when you run out or forget to take it on vacation. Pond’s has been so good to me and my family that I will never use anything else.

reviews.title: Non-inclusive ingredient list, but it works.
reviews.review_text: Being allergic to shae butter, I checked the ingredients for it before buying. I thought it was safe for me to use since it was not listed, but I was wrong. After my first use, my face turned into a marshmallow which led me to question what other ingredients they weren't listing. Shae butter is a very common and healthy moisturizing ingredient so it shouldn't cause concern for those of you who don't know what it is. However, it is concerning for me due to my allergy. The product works very well for those of you who don't care what's in it (which is why I gave it 2 instead of 1 stars), but I would think twice about purchasing it if you do care about the ingredients.

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.review_text: I use this every morning when I get up to start my day. It keeps my face feeling soft and moisturized without clogging my pores! I really love Ponds! My grandmother and my mother used it, it has been our go to moisturizer for generations! Thanks Ponds!

reviews.title: Amazing!! Best Face Moisturizer Ever!
reviews.review_text: This is the best facial moisturizer I have ever used! I am 50 years old and have used my share of products, so I can honestly say, this is the only one that has actually made a difference. It has made my skin soft and clear, but most importantly has left it feeling very hydrated. Even my makeup goes on smoother. I would recommend this product to everyone with dry skin.

reviews.title: An excellent product as always.
reviews.review_text: I thought the Pond's Dry Skin Cream was wonderful, this Crema S has it beat hands down! It's wonderfully creamy, the long-lasting moisture formula and it's by Pond's a company with products the women in my family have used for generations. (Grandmother, mom and me). My mom encouraged me to really moisturize shortly after I married at 21, I am so glad she did, I am 65 today and still get compliments. I remember the large heavy milk glass like jars my mom would have on her dresser and that familiar delicate Pond's fragrance. (I would see her use it on her body as well as her face and neck too) My face, neck, and decolletage are the main concentration areas and they are looking better than ever. I love the rich even satiny glow it gives my skin, especially under makeup. I would give it more stars if I could, it's fabulous!

reviews.title: As Good As It Gets
reviews.review_text: On a trip to Colorado my skin was very uncomfortably dry peeling and itching. I stopped at a local drug store and picked up a jar of ponds for very dry skin. I had never used it before and didn't know what the effects would be since I do have problems with acne and clogged pores. I was amazed at the difference it made in my skin and I have continued to use it. The results have been wonderful and I will never look back. Not only has it unclogged my pores but it has softened my skin, smooth out the wrinkles caused from dry skin and aging. Ponds was always the old time favorite my mothers. I purchased all the newly developed products but nothing compared to what this product has done for my skin. I plan on trying all of the Ponds products. The next generation of Ponds users.

reviews.title: | SENSITIVE SKIN |
reviews.review_text: I use to love ponds but over the past few weeks/months I would apply the blue capped ponds dry skin facial moisturizer before my makeup, before bed, and in the morning or really whenever my face felt dry and I never noticed till now what it has been doing to my skin. I thought it was because of my birth control but it is not, it’s the cream. I have very sensitive skin and this tends to be very greasy/oily and THICK when you put it on the skin so I’m guessing it’s just clogging my pores. But it has changed my skin dramatically and I have been breaking out SO bad. I wouldn’t recommend this for people with acne prone/sensitive skin.

reviews.title: Ponds has hit a home run.
reviews.review_text: This is the best moisturizer I have ever used. It has taken years off the appearance of my skin and because I have extremely dry skin, this is just short of a miracle. I wish to commend Ponds for making a product that actually does what it says it will. I am using it in conjunction with Ponds Rejuveness Anti-Wrinkle Creme and had really wonderful results. All of the blemishes and dark spots are fading and because my skin looks healthier, the wrinkles seem to have faded. I would recommend both of these products to anyone who wants healthier looking and more youthful skin.

reviews.title: Everything I have been looking for
reviews.review_text: I have tried multiple facial moisturizers and none have work this awesome! I have a random dry patch of skin that is flaky across my forehead and along side my nose. The patches are completely gone after 3 days of use. The moisturizer last 24 hours and has my skin looking phenomenal!

reviews.title: Amazing moisture, way too scented
reviews.review_text: I love the way this product moisturizes. My skin is smooth and supple and looks visibly hydrated. But holy smokes is it perfume-y! The scent is very, very strong and lasts for a while after application. My partner has asked me to not wear it anymore, especially to bed as it irritates the nose. A shame, really, because other than the overwhelmingly strong scent, it’s great.

reviews.title: Hydrating
reviews.review_text: This lotion has been one of my favorites since I was a kid. It is very light in texture and definitely keeps the skin hydrated and soft throughout the day. It is my absolute go to when it comes to lotion. It has a slight clean scent that isn't to strong. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer!
reviews.review_text: First time user of this specific Pond's product. I have used Pond's in the past and love it. I have to say that I am in love with the scent. The moisturizer is supposed to be used at any time of the day but love it as my nighttime routine. It sits nicely with my other facial products and when I wake up in the morning my face feels so nice. Its a heavy cream, so if you are prone to breakouts you might want to go light with this one. I find that it works great on my eyes as well. Again this is my opinion and what worked for me. I am already half way done with the jar and will purchase again. Its good for the dry California weather.

reviews.title: Feels Wonderful
reviews.review_text: bought the Crema today and it feels great on my face, not heavy, greasy but, it smells like cucumbers. I love to eat them but I don't want to smell them constantly. its been about an hour and the smell has diminished a touch. with this smell im afraid it may give me a headache but we'll see. wish all Pond's products offered "no" smell in them :)

reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
reviews.review_text: Having dry skin , tried everything... I mean every thing... Saw product, and I remember that my grandma and aunts used this moisturizer.. worked great . Dry skin gone today!! Only purchased small jar to try out .. I will be purchasing the biggest jar they have ... My face feel hydrated,not tight , I keep touching my face it's so soft !!

reviews.title: Very moisturizing
reviews.review_text: Ponds has been around for so long- my Mom used to use it when I was a kid. My husband loves this cream. He uses it on his face and he loves that it is so moisturizing. It has a light, fresh scent too. I've tried it and like it too. It moisturizes without leaving skin oily

reviews.title: Great product--My facial skin back to life
reviews.review_text: I have been using Pond's cold cream for almost 2 decades now. Whether its a wedding or any event or a normal regular day and in all weather conditions, Pond's cold cream had been my only cream. Offlate, I ran out of my cream and didnt get time to stop by the store to buy this product. I have other different kinds of moisturizers at home, so I thought they would be as good as Ponds(Lubiderm, Vaseline, Nivea,Aveeno). But my skin never felt lively as it used to be (while using Pond's cold cream). I never had acne., but realized that I see pimple on my cheeks for the first time in my life. I rushed back to store and finally after applying it, I feel my skin got its life back. Thanks Pond's. I wish Pond's do release their facial powder here in US. We get them only in India. Pond's Cold cream and Pond's magic powder are the only make up on my facial skin for over 2 decades.

reviews.title: Holy Grail Skin
reviews.review_text: I've gotten serious about my skincare since my early 20's when my body started changing in all aspects & Ponds has been my go-to. I ran out of moisturizer and used my mom's, and I've been hooked ever since! I have combination oily skin, and this moisturizer gives me so much balance. Moisture, without oiliness. My skin is also very sensitive and this moisturizer does not clog my pores or make me look sweaty/greasy. It's a 10 out of 10 for me, and I would absolutely recommend for all skin types!

reviews.title: Another triumph for Ponds!
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try Ponds cold cream for a make up remover again. I saw The anti-wrinkle cream jar right next to the cold cream. I decided to give it a try. I love it! It’s a little heavy for a day moisturizer so I use it for my night treatment. The fragrance is light; not overwhelming like others.

reviews.title: wonderul mosturizer
reviews.review_text: I purchased a large jar and started using it on my face and neck. I had some wrinkles at the corner of my eyes and some on my neck. After a couple of weeks use it has made a difference, I noticed that my wrinkles have definitely diminished if not disappeared. I am 62 and had noticed that I was getting more wrinkles before I stated using the crema s moisturizer.I noticed that my face in general seems to be softer and even the wrinkles in my forehead have largely disappeared. In fact since I have been using crema I appear to much younger looking.I will definitely be using crema from now on.

reviews.title: Simply wonderful ❣️
reviews.review_text: I think good skin care shouldn't be difficult or expensive! Pond's makes talking good care of your skin easy and affordable. I love this nourishing face cream. I use it after I cleanse with Pond's cleansing balm. My skin is nourished, soft and looks fantastic! I LOVE POND'S ❣️

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.review_text: I love this nourishing moisturizing cream. My skin feels so moist but not greasy. My only problem is I cannot find it in a large jar....I only find it in the 1.75 ounce sample jar so therefore I am buying many little jars. Thank you Ponds for this incredible cream.

reviews.title: Works great.
reviews.review_text: I live in a city know for extremely cold weather which means heated rooms that pull moisture from your skin. I started using this and love it. It makes my skin comfortable. I apply in morning, afternoon (on days I have off work), and before bed. It's affordable and works. Give it a try you might be pleased.

reviews.title: Great Moisturizer
reviews.review_text: This cream goes on beautifully. I put it on my face when I get out of the shower. It really hydrates and adds a nice sheen to my skin without making it look oily. It works well with my foundation and appears to make the foundation stay put longer. I have sensitive skin and it does not irritate it at all. My only complaint is the scent reminds me of flowers at a wake (sorry, that was my first impression). The scent lessens after a few minutes, so I can deal with it. Overall, I am very impressed with this product and you can't beat the price.

reviews.title: the best so far
reviews.review_text: this is the only cream that still works for my unconventional eczema breakouts (after many failed prescription and otc ointmens, creams, lotions). the only cream that my skin absorbs and responds to very well in general. I can tolerate the fragrance, although still wish it was fragrance free. I think this cream is similar to Nivea cream in a blue tin. but I can't stand the awful Nivea smell period. and it's way heavier and more greasy compared to Ponds as I can recall.

reviews.title: So Happy To Look Youthful Again
reviews.review_text: I suffer from very dry, flaky and red skin on my face during the winter months. I've recently purchased 8 different products including supposed..moisturizing cleansers, serums, lotions and a face cream. However, none of them worked..multiple products would "pill up" on my face and 20 minutes after applying you couldn't even tell i had used them. But then...I found Ponds. My great aunt, who always had such a beautiful face told me to try Ponds. She swore by it, as it is the only product she's used in over 50 years! I was determined to immediately go pick up a jar and try it for myself. Voila! Immediately I felt a difference, my skin felt refreshed, felt like elasticity was back and it has a nice Glow! I didn't realize how beautiful I look...Thanks Ponds for giving me my youthful pretty face back!

reviews.title: So Far So Good But...
reviews.review_text: My stepmom has always used the Pond's with the blue lid for dry skin. Due to hormonal changes, my skin has gotten very dry and I haven't been pleased with my normal moisturizers. So...I was going to get the Pond's with the blue lid for dry skin but decided to give this one a try first. It feels good on my face and my facial skin isn't hurting which is great. The dryness is a big problem so this feels good. But WHY the mineral oil and the parabens? I would feel so much better if a substitute was in this....there are so many good oils to use besides petroleum products, I just don't understand why this is STILL in the Pond's.

reviews.title: AWESOME FOR THE PRICE. TOTALLY GET THIS.
reviews.review_text: Awesome for dry skin! Leaves my skin hydrated, ive been using this since middle school and it's the absolute best moisturizer for sensitive and dry skin. Love its scent and the way it applies and doesn't leave my skin oily or patchy. Great product and my grandmother has been using it her whole life and she has clear and beautiful hydrated skin. Love this product for all ages.
I was able to find everything and self-check out quickly.

reviews.title: Great Product
reviews.review_text: I've been using Ponds Cream S Nourishing Moisturizer for years. I love that is keeps my face so smooth. It last longer than other products I've used like this.

reviews.title: Excellent for dry skin!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The consistency of the cream is absolutely amazing. It hydrates my skin, without leaving oily like other brands! Perfect for dry skin!

reviews.title: Recommend buying!
reviews.review_text: The scent smells really good! The texture is nice and soft! The Packaging is a great fit for a small moisturizer like this one! The Effectiveness makes my skin turn out really soft and helps clear and hydrate

reviews.title: Works super well
reviews.review_text: The scent is great. It's super smooth and works made my legs super smooth. It absorbs into my skin super well. The packaging isn't anything special it's basic

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: The scent isn't my favorite but I do love that it makes ur skin super soft. I use it on my face daily and even at night. I love that it absorbs slowly into the skin to have a lasting effect. Ur skin feels super soft after using.

reviews.title: Hydrating and non-irritating, skin feels smooth
reviews.review_text: Today was day one. I still have a little bit to see if it works but I can tell my skin already feels so hydrated. Does not feel oily. Feels very smooth and not irritated. Super cheap but feels luxurious

reviews.title: Keeps my face soft and smooth!
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. I was purchasing really expensive products and didn't see much of a result - so on a whim - I bought Pond's Crema S. The results are wonderful, my skin is so much softer and well hydrated - and I'm a diabetic!

reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer

They were both sold out at the time, which is why I opted for this alternative. Won't be buying again.

reviews.title: Best lotion ever!!!
reviews.review_text: I've tried almost every lotion and cream out there and this is the best lotion with safe ingredients! No irritating fragrance or ginger, like other gold bond products. It absorbs so quickly and does not leave any greasiness or stickiness. It's not the most hydrating lotion for dry skin, it's more for normal skin. Dry skin really needs a thick cream. It comes out thick but melts into a thin watery lotion like feel. Hours later my skin was so soft. Great for diabetics, like me. Just try it out! Can definitely use on face as all ingredients are safe according to an ingredient check website.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am in love the the Gold Bond Pure Moisture Daily Body & Face Lotion!! I was used to some of their past products, that were a bit too oily for me. This new Pure Moisture Daily Body & Face Lotion is amazing!!! My hands and skin are both super dry, due to Fall and will be worse in the Winter. This lotion has already helped with that, in just a few days. I cannot wait to continue using it and see how well it works. It soaks in quickly, stays full of moisture even after washing and smells amazing! I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_text: I use this lotion everyday on my body and my face. It is not greasy and absorbs quickly and is good for sensitive skin. I also use it on my extremely dry hands throughout the day and it has helped tremendously with the cracking and ashiness on my hands.

reviews.review_text: This is a light-to-medium weight moisturizer that absorbs quickly and leaves no greasy feeling. Providing the same effective hydration as their standalone lotion, it provides a convenience as you're now able to achieve the same results using one less product. I was worried initially because it has a thinner consistency than their hand/body lotion but I was very satisfied after use as there wasn't a noticeable difference in how my hands/body looked and felt while still providing a superior level of moisturizing.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: I love this Gold Bond lotion. I can feel the improvement it makes on my skin in just a couple uses. I didn't feel it was too oily and the consistency was great. reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is my favorite lotion to take around with me. It's thick and hydrating, but not oily or sticky. reviews.title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have to admit, I was very skeptical to use this lotion on my face because I have very sensitive skin, but using this face, neck and chest cream is my new favorite thing. It is instantly hydrating and does not clog pores. A little goes a long way!! Will be incorporating this into my skincare routine!!

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'm very picky about anything that goes on my facial skin, but I completely love Cetaphil and knew this would be a hit!
