reviews.title: I love this!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This moisturizer is great for all skin types and doesn't leave my skin feeling dry. I would recommend giving it a try! I have noticed that my skin feels hydrated all day! I feel like I can see a difference in my crepey skin on my neck, chest, and even in the corners of my eyes. I would recommend these products!

reviews.title: Works great on face and neck area
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My wife and I have " older skin" and it doesn't bounce back like it use to. Cetaphil hydrating and firming cream felt amazing on my face and neck! We have both noticed a difference too. I highly recommend it!

reviews.title: Beautiful hydration
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'm very happy with my new hydrating cream for the face, neck, and chest. My dry, aging skin truly needs extra hydration and elasticity, and I can already see amazing results. The formula feels gentle with no irritation or discomfort, and I love that it's made with natural ingredients like CICA and mandelic acid. It comes in great packaging and is easy to apply definitely a win for mature skin care.

reviews.title: Firms the skin up
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is very effective and helps so much with aging skin. The feel.and texture of this product is very smooth. It doesn't have a scent, and that is perfect for me. I really enjoyed the easy to use packaging.

reviews.title: I like the cream..
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received a free product from Influenster and Cetaphil in exchange for my honest review. The product I received is Hydrating and Firming Cream Skin Activator. I've been loving this cream lately; it has a much thicker consistency compared to the lotion versions. It feels incredibly rich and luxurious on my skin, which is a real treat. I'm so happy with how it leaves my skin feeling, and it keeps it hydrated all day long. Even after washing my face, my skin still feels beautifully moisturized.

reviews.title: Refreshing cream for smoother skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This skin activator hydrating cream has been my nightly routine for about two weeks now. I love the fact that it scent free and it's for sensitive skin. I haven't broken out and it doesn't leave my skin feeling oily. I like the fact that it's a bit on the thicker cream side but not to thick and makes my skin feel smooth and refreshed.

reviews.title: Wonderful for the chest!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product was literally a godsend. I'm so happy to have been able to try the skin activator, hydrating, firming neck, chest and face cream and let me tell you I have put it in all of those places the ingredients sent and texture of the cream are just wonderful and they squeeze out so easily from the packaging and I've never had a chest before and this is just been so nice to try to rub on my chest. I feel so calm and I feel so smooth and now it's just so wonderful. Being able to try this wonderful cream.

reviews.title: a+
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] at first I thought this would be too thick for my face, but I really loved how this helped with dry patches that I have around my nose and on my upper cheekbones. I don't necessarily know if I need firming in my face or neck, but this felt good

reviews.title: Rich moisturizing cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am so happy with this new Skin Activator line from Cetaphil. The tube of Hydrating and Firming Cream very effective. This is thicker than a normal facial moisturizer so it takes less product to get good coverage. It softens and spreads nicely across the skin. I use it in the evenings for overnight moisturizing of my face, neck, and chest. I also like it during the day for quick moisture on my hands when they feel dry. It definitely hydrates my skin giving it a plumper, firmer, less crepey look. It is a heavier cream that I use in the evenings. It is gentle and has caused no irritation or breakouts. This is a high-quality product with the effectiveness you expect from Cetaphil. I like that it is packaged in this tube that is easy to open and easy to dispense just the amount of product I want. I can keep it on the counter or nightstand. It is also easy to carry in a bag when I am on the go so I can moisturize my skin whenever, wherever. I am very happy with the results I get from this cream.

reviews.title: Firmer, smoother skin that looks youthful!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was looking for a cream that would benefit my neck & chest because l have noticed wringle lines. I was skeptical at first that such a cream could benefit my neck & chest and make my areas of need look young again, but this is a great product! Super moisturizing, fast absorbing, and my skin stays so hydrated all day. The cream feels so silky and leaves my skin feelings so nice, I love this delicate skin-firming option. I'm very happy with the outcome of this cream. It is super lightweight and non greasy and has a very pleasant aroma to it. As you age, the neck is one of the most visible places for aging. With a high-quality product like this and with daily use, I can keep looking younger.

reviews.title: Best moisturizer I've used
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is by FAR the best moisturizer I've ever used, (and I've tried more than 20) Not only does my makeup look better with this moisturizer, but I started using it nightly for 2 weeks. In those 2 weeks I noticed a red rash I had started dissappearing, my pores improved, have you ever heard a moisturizer help with pores? I had not. My pores started minimizing and my face skin now looks moisturized and healthy. I'm glad it also works well under my makeup, and that the rash didn't come back. I was skeptical at the beginning because I have oily skin and the moisturizer is a thicker consistency, but boy was I wrong! I love that this moisturizer is easy to squeeze, it's very convenient for when I have long nails. I will definitely keep buying this over and over.

reviews.title: worth having
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using neck cream for years. I know many people don't care about their necks look, but I've definitely benefited from it. My neck looks younger than those of people a decade younger, with no noticeable wrinkles. This Cetaphil Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming neck, Chest & Face cream is worth having. Start using it now and you'll be pleasantly surprised.

reviews.title: Perfect for my hands and face! And doesn't clog p
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is my favorite in this whole line of products! It has a perfect consistency that doesn't leave my skin feeling too wet and always relives the dryness my skin is prone to. It has no scent which I love as most lotions I put on my face have too strong of a smell. I've been using this line of products on my face neck and hands for several weeks and I've noticed the most difference on my hands which used to be incredibly dry and cracked. Thankful I found this product as it is helping an issue that other products failed to help.

reviews.title: Great everyday moisturizer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using this daily on my face and neck. It definitely hydrates and feels really nice. I like the scent it has a light clean scent I'm so happy it's not heavily fragranced it's perfect for sensitive skin. I've noticed my skin is smooth and very hydrating. Definitely have been liking it. It's not sticky or heavy feeling which is perfect to layer under my makeup.

reviews.title: Very rich for deep moisturizing
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] the Skin Activator Hydrating & Firming Neck, Chest & Face Cream comes in a tube and is the thickest of the three formulas I tried. I have a large scar on my neck from a thyroid removal, and was interested how this formula would affect the scarred skin as well as my normal neck skin. A very small amount covers my whole neck, and takes a little effort to rub in evenly. It really does keep my skin hydrated until I shower next. Even after washing my skin feels less dry. Too much product makes my skin feel slightly greasy, but isn't unpleasant.

reviews.title: Hydration for the whole body
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been focusing more on my neck and chest area lately, and this cream has been a great addition to my routine. It feels silky and gives my skin a nice hydrated glow. I do think my skin texture in those areas looks smoother. I knocked off one star because the tube is on the smaller side, and I go through it pretty quickly

reviews.title: Very Hydrating!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using this product twice daily per instructions for two weeks, and I have noticed a difference in my skin! It is also very hydrating and makes me feel more refreshed throughout the day! I will definitely be purchasing more in the future.

reviews.title: Great daily facial moisturizer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using this moisturizer every day on my face and neck. I love the light texture, because it does a great job locking in moisture but also does not feel greasy. The bottle is also easy to use and travel with and it will go a long way.

reviews.title: Too thick for me
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was happy to try this brand. This is supposed to help with firmness in the neck and chest area. The package is very easy to dispense but the crème seemed a little too thick and too a bit for my skin to absorb it. I don't like that the second ingredient after water is seed oil. I think that is why this product is very thick and a little too heavy. I did try to use it however it did not absorb very well and I just wasn't a fan.

reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin too
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a creamy and thick cream but absorbs really fast and welll into my skin. I love the texture of this and the way it melts in and makes my skin so soft. I noticed a slight difference after a week of using this, my skin looks and feels more youthful, soft, hydrated, and firm. I love cetaphil because it works well and is great for sensitive skin.

reviews.title: Great at soothing skin.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The cetaphil activator hydrating and firming neck, chest, and face cream was great! It helped me out on my neck and chest after going to Disney and getting a bit of a sunburn. It's thick and helpful and has no scent, which is great. I didn't use it much on my face because it felt a little too thick but I did use it on my shoulders. It helped a lot. It's a good product.

reviews.title: Smooth
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'm so excited to have received this form of cream. I'm 50 years old, and though I don't look my age, I love that I can start using this cream to slow down the signs of aging. I can't wait to see the difference in my fine lines around my neck and chest area. However, I will not be using this on my face only because I have oily skin and already have a great skincare line going right now. I don't want it to make my face skin look more greasy than it already can get. But I definitely love it for the neck and chest area!

reviews.title: Helps with dryness!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] At the age of 54, I can slowly see the unpreventable aging process of my skin. Using Cetaphil has helped with the dryness in the two weeks I've used it. I imagine what it would be like as I continue to use this product. It is unscented and so is nice for those who don't like the potent smells of some of these lotions. Perhaps on the long run, continuing to use this product may keep my skin looking young.

reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil skin activator hydrating and neck firming, chest face cream. It's perfect for on the go when you're feeling a little bit dry or just need some a hydration to your skin to make you look more alive. You can definitely tell a difference in the firming action if you continue to use it for a small period of time. It is unscented and rubs in very well without a sticky residue

reviews.title: Fragrance free hydration and firming cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love using this Cetaphil cream on my neck and chest. I do use it on my face, but for that, I wish it were a little less thick and creamy. I feel like my neck is really benefitting from the hydration and firming effect. And I love love the fact this cream is fragrance free. I saw a difference in my skin's hydration level after using this only one or two days.

reviews.title: New staple in my routine!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using the Cetaphil Hydrating & Firming Cream on my face, neck, and chest for a couple of weeks now, and I can definitely see a difference in the firmness of my skin. While I haven't noticed much change yet with fine lines, I still absolutely love how it makes my skin feel…hydrated, smooth, and more youthful. It's gentle, effective, and has definitely earned a permanent spot in my skincare routine!

reviews.title: Strong chemical smell
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I don't like the smell of this cream, it smells like chemical. The cream is quite thick and a bit sticky. Had been applying it for 3 days both in the morning and evening, so far can't see any significant changes. Due to the strong smell of chemical, I do not recommend it.

reviews.title: Cetaphil
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This body cream is great. It's another amazing product from Cetaphil and I'm very happy with it. It's a brand that I trust and I use their facial cleanser on a daily basis. It's a thicker consistency but was easy and smooth to apply. Absorbs well into my skin and doesn't leave it greasy or oily. It is scentless so no smell and is great for those with sensitive noses or to put on or near my face. The tub is a generous size and since a little goes a long way, I can see it lasting me quite a while. If you like a body cream that feels extra nourishing without being heavy, this one's a winner.

reviews.title: Compact and non greasy firming lotion
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been using this product on my neck and have noticed results. The product is non greasy and no smell of chemicals or fake scents. The product is small enough to fit in a travel bag for a weekend away

reviews.title: Thick
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cetaphil neck, chest, and face cream is a really thick formula. It's very hydrating but it made my face greasy and caused a few breakout spots. I used less and it worked out better. A little bit goes a long way with this cream. It takes this formula longer to fully absorb due to it being so thick. The tube is very easy to dispense and store. It is unscented and very effective for hydrating your skin.

reviews.title: Great body lotion!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The pump bottle is very easy to use and control how much lotion is dispensed with each pump. The lotion has no smell at all and it's good for my sensitive nose. The lotion's texture is not thick, not thin either but it absorbs easily and fast, leaving no residue and a greasy feeling. I use it twice a day, especially after a warm bath so it will be absorbed deeper. My skin feels silky smooth 😌 after applying. So far my skin looks more moist, less scaling, healthier after three weeks of continued use of this lotion and firming cream. I recommend the Cerave product line for anyone sensitive but looking for effective results.

reviews.title: Great lotion for SHINGLES.
reviews.review_text: I had a long, lingering case of Shingles on my hand. Had tried OTC items, herbal remedies %26 even Enu Oil (helped but NO CURE%26@ $30/pr 2oz, it shd've). I'm severely allergic to most lotions %26 creams, so I have to be really careful. I was given this as a gift %26 had NOT even opened the bottle. I gave it a try %26 to my amazement, the 1st day the redness started going away, the 2nd day,redness was gone. The 3rd day there was no pain or itching. The 4th day, my skin looked almost perfect %26 the 5th day, the Shingles was completely gone. It worked "MIRACLES" on my SHINGLES %26 I hope this "Jergens oil infused hydrating COCONUT with Coconut Oil %26 Coconut Water, 24 hour moisturizer",does the same for you. Be careful, Jergens makes several different Coconut lotions. Make sure you buy this particular one, ONLY.

Jergens Hydrating Coconut Body Lotion is a game-changer for anyone dealing with dry skin. With its rich blend of coconut oil and water, it provides deep hydration that leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized for hours. The texture is lightweight and non-greasy, which makes it easy to apply and absorb quickly, perfect for daily use. The subtle coconut scent is refreshing but not overpowering, giving a pleasant tropical feel without being too strong. I also love that it's dermatologist-tested, which reassures me about its quality and suitability for sensitive skin. The 16.8 oz bottle is generously sized and lasts a long time, offering great value. After just a few uses, I noticed a significant improvement in my skin's texture—no more dry patches! This lotion is especially good during colder months when my skin tends to dry out more. Overall, Jergens Hydrating Coconut Body Lotion delivers on its promise of hydrating and nourishing the skin, and I'd highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable solution to combat dryness.

reviews.title: Works Great!

There is dry skin cells coming off but that isn't what you're seeing. This stuff works great, is just as good as the more expensive face washes in the same style and left my skin primed and ready for the face mask i used after! And it's only $10!! Definitely worth a try for those that love a good exfoliating face wash like this!

reviews.title: Better than expected

It works differently from an abrasive and feels like it's lifting dead skin instead of scrubbing it off. I use in combination with the holy hydration line and super bounce serum. Ya girl is starting to get carded again!

reviews.title: I'm in Love with this 😍But Reviewers are mistaken
reviews.review_text: I am a skincare junkie and Elf's skincare is so slept on. Don't even get me started on the Pure Skin line!! SO good. Anyway, I do want to educate people on this product, because I've noticed a lot of the Reviewers don't sewm to understand what's going on here. In Asian skincare, they make exfoliating products called "Peeling Gels." That is definitely where Elf got the inspiration for this product. I love peeling gels SO much. They provide gentle physical exfoliation, and many have fruit acids, PHAs, LHAs, etc to provide a light chemical exfoliation as well. What makes the Elf one stand out is the lotion like consistency when you first apply it, and I love the scent. My complexion is always super smooth and even toned after using this product. For the people who think they are seeing "so much dead skin coming off"...that is NOT your skin loves. 😂 That is the cellulose in the product that is intentionally formulated to ball up on itself. That is how the product works lol. The little bits of balled up cellulose are what provide the mechanical exfoliation. Now, obviously some dead skin will be removed..as that's the entire point of an exfoliating product, but 98% of what you are seeing is the product itself. The act of rubbing it in is what causes the product to ball up and exfoliate. I just felt the need to clear that up because it seems that there are a lot of customers who do not understand how this product works and, if you ever have THAT much dead skin balling up and falling off of your face, that would actually be a little concerning lol. Anyway, this product is spectacular and totally worth the price:) ✨️

reviews.title: Fantastic facial scrub
reviews.review_text: I use this scrub 3 days a week, and it has done an amazing job exfoliating my dry, sensitive skin with out redness or irritation. I apply it before showering about 3 times a week (note that it does need to be applied to DRY skin), give it a good massage, then rinse in the shower. It is a very creamy formulation that does not feel at all abrasive but really gets the job done. Plus, it is so affordable? Well done, E.L.F.!

As soon as I applied it to my face and began rubbing within SECONDS dead skin just started piling up everywhere and it only took 30 seconds to apply to my whole face and I had dead skin everywhere. Once rinsed my skin felt super smooth and shiny, so highly recommend getting this!

reviews.title: HOLY CRAP
reviews.review_text: First off, let me just say, the person who left a review saying it was misleading or didn't work is either lying or has a face made of stone. I have NEVER IN MY LIFE used a products that visibly pulled dead skin off my face. I mean visble clumps of dead skin. Insane!! And there's not a single grain of abrasive beads or sugar in it. It goes on soft like a face cream and as you message it lifts the dead skin and balls it up into little clumps. I used plenty of exfoliating face washes and I've never had this kind of result. BEWARE--- it says gentle, but I was stupid enough to use it 3 times a row to make sure all the dead skin was off....I ended up taking a layer off my nose 😂 the directions on the bottle clearly say to use it 2 or 3 times a WEEK...so I shouldn't have used it 3 times in a row back to back. That was stupid of me. But hey.... more proof it works VERY well. Lol.

reviews.title: Wonderful for Stubborn Skin!
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best purchases I've ever made. I have oily and sensitive skin, which means that get a lot of product built up on my skin, even after using a cleanser. Exfoliators with grit in them don't do anything with my skin but make it irritated, usually. But this product gently took *everything* off without irritation, and has left me with shockingly soft skin. I can actually FEEL AIR ON MY FACE! It's fantastic! The funniest part? My husband loves it for himself! Amazing product, will absolutely buy again.

reviews.title: Great for sensitive/reddish skin

reviews.title: Key word is gentle for this exfoliant
reviews.review_text: For those expecting instant results, the key word is gentle for this exfoliant and you need patience and commitment to achieve the complexion of your dreams. I am in my late 40s and have a light complexion with some sun and age spots and fine lines by the mouth and eyes. I tried out this Gentle Peeling Exfoliant and was impressed by the licorice root, papaya and tangerine extracts. Licorice root helps with dark spots on the skin, papaya helps remove dead skin and tangerine has vitamin C. These are all natural ingredients that together pack a punch for a better complexion without any dryness or excess inflammation. I found that I could tolerate this exfoliant without further irritating my skin and that's the kind of product I was looking for. I used this product once a week for 6 months and I liked how my skin looked calmer and smoother.

reviews.title: Good physical exfoliator, gentle
reviews.review_text: This is a physical, not chemical, exfoliant which works by trapping dead skin in cellulose fibers. It is easy to use and non-abrasive, you just rub it into the skin in small circles for a few minutes, then wash off. It is impossible to overdo it with this product, which is why I like it so much. I use it once per week before a mud mask and my skin glows after and is super soft.

reviews.title: The best Exfoliator I've ever used
reviews.review_text: Ok so let me just clarify that I only gave this product 4 stars because it contains fragrance and it came with a non-working dispenser. But other than that this product is the holy grail of exfoliators for me. I've been using Paula's Choice BHA & AHA products which many people consider holy grails, but the first use of the elf exfoliator removed more dead skin than Paula's Choice ever removed in the many months I've been using them. A few uses later and my skin is glowing. I thought I would have to go the rest of my life with my face looking dull and old with the layers of dead skin that was on there. I became really frustrated and just bought this product on a whim to make up the amount for afterpay lol. I didn't think it would really work, but after the first use I was sold. Please ELF, make this fragrance-free and I will be your unofficial ambassador for this product lol.

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.review_text: I looked for this all over just because it had great reviews. I had an issue with so much dry skin that when I would put my foundation on you could see all the little flakes. The first time I applied it to my skin I could instantly feel the dry skin falling off/coming off. After using the warm water to rinse my skin 1000 times softer. I read one of the comments below about this just being cellulose but I don't believe that. I tested the theory by trying it a second time shortly after and nothing balled up. I feel as if it was just something in the product. It would've done the same thing, but I think I just didn't have any more dead skin to remove and therefore the product just stayed is normal consistency.

reviews.title: Best Exfoliant Ever Used!
